2004 年，科学家弗里曼·戴森 (Freeman Dyson) 在一次开源软件大会上发表演讲时被问到，人类创造的技术系统是否会变得如此复杂，以至于我们无法理解它们。“机器将变得越来越复杂，”他回答道，“但它们不会像运行它们的社会那么复杂。”

Freeman Dyson, the scientist, on stage for a talk at an open source software conference in 2004, was asked whether the technological systems humankind creates will ever grow so complex that we can’t understand them. “The machines will become more and more complicated,” he replied, “but they won’t be as complicated as the societies that run them.”

当然，编程行业可以而且将会继续提高其技术技能和工具。程序员喜欢在他们的地盘上徘徊。他们几乎不会停止改进算法、改进后端代码和调整开发平台。

Certainly, the programming profession can and will continue to improve its technical skills and tools. Programmers love to linger on this part of their turf; there is little danger they will stop refining algorithms, improving back-end code, and tweaking development platforms.

但在这样做的过程中，他们是在磨斧头或给牦牛剃毛。他们没有处理问题的本质。任何机制，如果要在人类世界中完成任何功能，迟早都必须走出外壳，与人沟通。“归根结底，信息系统只有在接触到人类时才会产生价值，”Jaron Lanier 说。当它们真正触及人类时，完美的前景就消失了。

But in doing so, they are sharpening axes or shaving yaks. They are not dealing with the essence of the matter. Sooner or later any mechanism, if it is to accomplish any function in the human world, must come out of its shell and communicate with people. “Ultimately, information systems only give value when they touch human beings,” Jaron Lanier says. And when they do touch human beings, the prospect of perfection dissolves.

那么，软件的本质困难就是人类自由意志和不可预测性对技术进步造成的损失。尽管计算的兴起让许多科学家通过它的镜头来观察人类有机体——例如，想象大脑的功能映射到计算机的结构——但个人在很大程度上仍然是不可编程的。他们做的事情是最有想象力的程序员都意想不到的。他们想要的东西是那些程序员无法预料的。

Software’s essential difficulty, then, is the toll that human free will and unpredictability exact on technological progress. Though the rise of computing has led many scientists to view the human organism through its lens—imagining that the functions of the brain, for instance, map to the structure of a computer—individual people remain largely unprogrammable. They do things that the most imaginative programmers do not expect. And they want things that those programmers cannot anticipate.





2005 年夏天，比尔·盖茨在新加坡举行的微软研讨会上发表讲话，描述了在他的公司实验室进行的“计算机植入”研究。这种假肢电子设备的第一个应用涉及帮助盲人和聋人的产品。

In the summer of 2005, Bill Gates, talking at a Microsoft seminar in Singapore, described the research taking place at his company’s labs in “computer implants.” The first applications for such prosthetic electronics involve products that help blind and deaf people.

毫无疑问，这样的研究可以带来好处。为医疗应用构建可靠的数字设备当然是我们的能力范围内。但将通用计算机植入我们体内的更广泛前景立即引起了质疑和愤怒。我们信任谁来编写软件？我们信任谁来修改它？我们会致力于终生的升级和错误修复吗？

Doubtless there is good that can come from such research. Building reliable digital devices for medical applications is certainly within our power. But the broader prospect of implanting general-purpose computers in our bodies immediately raises questions and hackles. Whom would we trust to write the software? Whom would we trust to modify it? Will we be committing ourselves to a lifetime of upgrades and bug fixes?

作为软件征服现代生活的化身，盖茨似乎也有同样的疑虑。“在微软工作的一个人。。。总是对我说，‘我准备好了。请帮我插上电话，”他在新加坡活动中说道。“我的感觉不太一样。我很高兴电脑在那边，我就在这儿。”

Gates, the embodiment of software’s conquest of modern life, seems to share these qualms. “One of the guys that works at Microsoft . . . always says to me, ‘I’m ready. Plug me in,’” he said at the Singapore event. “I don’t feel quite the same way. I’m happy to have the computer over there and I’m over here.”





我从事软件工作的三年时间让我确信，尽管有令人兴奋的新方法论、严格的学科和突破性的想法的承诺，但制作软件仍然是、而且确实是困难的。但我可以听到反对意见：困难有不同的种类。养育一个孩子是很困难的。埋葬父母是一件很难的事情。出生和成长；与其他人一起生活或单独生活；尝试去爱他们；不爱他们；接受别人的死亡；接受你自己的——这些事情很难。软件？那是一个不同的、艰难的、较小的宇宙。

My three years on software time left me with no doubt that, for all the promise of exciting new methodologies and rigorous disciplines and breakthrough ideas, making software is still, and truly, hard. But I can hear the objection: There are different kinds of hard. Raising a child is hard. Burying a parent is hard. Birth and growing; living with other people or without them; trying to love them; failing to love them; accepting someone else’s death; accepting your own—these things are hard. Software? That’s a different universe of hard, a lesser one.

对此唯一理智的回答是，是的。事实上，对于那些喜欢修补高耸的代码谜题宫殿的人来说，软件所呈现的那种难度与极客所谓的“湿软件”生活中令人困惑、难以屈服的挫折形成了鲜明的对比。它是独立的。这是理性的。而且它没有恶意。从这个意义上说，软件一点也不难。正如 Ellen Ullman 在她的编程小说《The Bug》中所描述的那样，这是一件轻而易举的事，是“从世界的混乱中解脱出来的一种解脱” 。

To which the only sane response is, yes. In fact, for those who enjoy the chance to tinker with towering puzzle palaces of code, the kind of difficulty software presents serves as a welcome contrast to the perplexing, unyielding frustrations of what geeks call our “wetware” lives. It is self-contained. It is rational. And it harbors no malice. In this sense, software isn’t hard at all. It’s a breeze, a “relief from the confusions of the world,” as Ellen Ullman described it in her novel of programming, The Bug.

由于其重复的循环和无限的延迟，编程工作总是让人想起西西弗斯无休止地将巨石滚上山的劳动。这正是徒劳的形象。然而，阿尔伯特·加缪对西西弗斯神话最著名的现代解释是存在主义的诠释，它告诉我们，这个注定要失败的希腊人在他的作品中体验到了一种奇怪的快乐。“人们必须想象西西弗斯是快乐的，”加缪说。

With its repetitious cycles and its infinite delays, the work of programming has always brought to mind the labor of Sisyphus endlessly rolling his boulder up the hill. It’s the very image of futility. Yet the best-known modern interpretation of the Sisyphus myth, Albert Camus’s existentialist take, tells us that the doomed Greek experiences a strange kind of joy in his work. “One must imagine Sisyphus happy,” Camus says.

我采访过并在研究过程中认识的大多数程序员都始终对他们的工作持乐观态度，有时甚至是莫名其妙。如果他们是西西弗斯，他们就是幸福的人。

Most of the programmers I have interviewed and gotten to know in the course of my research are consistently, and sometimes unaccountably, optimistic about their work. If they are Sisyphuses, they are happy ones.





万物倒塌又重生，

All things fall and are built again,

那些再次建造它们的人都是同性恋。

And those that build them again are gay.

——威廉·巴特勒·叶芝，《青金石》

—William Butler Yeats, “Lapis Lazuli”

在计算时代的最初几十年，即 20 世纪 50 年代和 60 年代，计算机作为万无一失的奇迹进入了大众的想象。错误属于人类；计算机没有出错。那些与计算机密切合作的人总是明白事实要复杂得多：人为错误和计算机精度的区域在任何可以想象的地图上都没有明显的边界；其中一个流血到另一个；计算机在很多方面都非常出色和独特，但它们本身没有也不可能超越其创造者的能力和局限性。

Computers entered the popular imagination in the first decades of the era of computing, the 1950s and ’60s, as marvels of infallibility. Error belonged to human beings; the computer did not make mistakes. Those humans who worked closely with computers always understood that the truth was far more complex: that the regions of human error and of computer precision had no discernible borders on any conceivable map; that one bled into the other; and that computers, remarkable and unique in so many ways, did not and could not by themselves transcend the capabilities and limitations of their creators.

近几十年来，我们都开始与计算机密切合作，计算机万无一失的神话已经失去了力量。今天，我们已经开始认识到，运行我们世界的软件并不比构建和编程它的人的双手和思想更完美。这些人还有很多东西需要学习如何改进该软件。但我们的目标是让它变得更好、更好——更好到我们甚至都认不出它了；好得多，以至于我们最终可以对某些特定工作或活动的软件说，“完成了”——这个目标看起来遥不可及。

In more recent decades we have all begun to work closely with computers, and the myth of computer infallibility has lost its power. Today, we have begun to grasp that the software which runs our world is no more perfectible than the hands and minds of the people who build and program it. Those people still have plenty more to learn about how to make that software better. But the goal of making it vastly, transformingly better—so much better that we can’t even recognize it anymore; so much better that we could finally say about software for some particular job or activity, “It’s done”—that goal looks unattainable.

意识到这一点可能会让程序员感到绝望，但事实并非如此。每一次制作软件的努力最终都必须被证明是不完整的，这一想法让人感到解放。这意味着总是有额外尝试的空间，总是有机会让新一代再次解决这个问题，总是有人会欢迎“又一个”计划。

Realizing this could overwhelm programmers with a sense of despair, but it doesn’t. There is something liberating in the thought that every effort to make software must ultimately prove incomplete. It means that there is always room for an additional try, always an opportunity for a new generation to take another bite at the problem, always someone somewhere who will welcome “Yet Another” program.





2002 年春天，大约在 Mitch Kapor 和 Chandler 团队的早期成员开始将其新软件架构归零的时候，Kapor 因完全不同的事情登上了科技新闻头条：他对前景进行了长期赌注用于人工智能。Long Bets 是 Long Now 基金会的一个项目，该基金会是一个非营利组织，由《全球目录》的创建者斯图尔特·布兰德和一群数字时代的知名人士发起，旨在激发有关长期问题的讨论和创意。作为该项目的第一个大赌注，卡普尔下了 20,000 美元的赌注（所有奖金都专门用于有价值的非营利机构），赌到 2029 年，没有计算机或“机器智能”能够通过图灵测试。（为了通过图灵测试（通常通过相当于即时消息的方式进行），计算机程序必须本质上欺骗人类，让他们相信他们正在与人而不是机器交谈。）

In the spring of 2002, around the time Mitch Kapor and the early members of the Chandler team were beginning to zero in on their new software’s architecture, Kapor made the tech news headlines for something entirely different: He entered into a Long Bet about the prospects for artificial intelligence. Long Bets were a project of the Long Now Foundation, a nonprofit organization started by Whole Earth Catalog creator Stewart Brand and a group of digital-age notables as a way to spur discussion and creative ideas about long-term issues and problems. As the project’s first big-splash Long Bet, Kapor wagered $20,000 (all winnings earmarked for worthy nonprofit institutions) that by 2029 no computer or “machine intelligence” will have passed the Turing Test. (To pass a Turing Test, typically conducted via the equivalent of instant messaging, a computer program must essentially fool human beings into believing that they are conversing with a person rather than a machine.)

雷·库兹韦尔 (Ray Kurzweil) 是这场赌注的另一方，他是一位多产的发明家，在电子乐器和语音识别方面取得了突破，最近又成为一种激进的未来主义的积极推动者。库兹韦尔对能够通过图灵测试的机器的信念是他更大信条的一部分——人类历史即将因摩尔定律的指数加速和许多其他类似的向上攀登曲线而进入超速状态。库兹韦尔表示，随着计算能力、存储容量和网络速度的不断翻倍开始发挥其魔力，并且所有这些能力的价格持续下降，我们将达到一个关键时刻，我们可以在技术上模拟人脑，对我们自己的计算机硬件和软件有机处理器进行逆向工程。与此同时，生物技术及其侍女纳米技术将以同样爆炸性的速度增强其威力。

Taking the other side of the bet was Ray Kurzweil, a prolific inventor responsible for breakthroughs in electronic musical instruments and speech recognition who had more recently become a vigorous promoter of an aggressive species of futurism. Kurzweil’s belief in a machine that could ace the Turing Test was one part of his larger creed—that human history was about to be kicked into overdrive by the exponential acceleration of Moore’s Law and a host of other similar skyward-climbing curves. As the repeated doublings of computational power, storage capacity, and network speed start to work their magic, and the price of all that power continues to drop, according to Kurzweil, we will reach a critical moment when we can technologically emulate the human brain, reverse-engineering our own organic processors in computer hardware and software. At the same time, biotechnology and its handmaiden, nanotechnology, will be increasing their powers at an equally explosive rate.

当这些变化联合起来时，我们将到达库兹韦尔以及其他与他观点相同的人所称的“奇点”的时刻。这个术语最早由科学家和科幻小说作家弗诺·文奇（Vernor Vinge）推广，借用自物理学。就像黑洞或时空经纬中任何类似的裂缝一样，奇点是连续性的破坏，是与过去的决裂。到了这个点，一切都会发生变化，而超出这个点我们就看不到了。

When these changes join forces, we will have arrived at a moment that Kurzweil, along with others who share his perspective, calls “the Singularity.” The term, first popularized by the scientist and science fiction author Vernor Vinge, is borrowed from physics. Like a black hole or any similar rent in the warp and woof of space-time, a singularity is a disruption of continuity, a break with the past. It is a point at which everything changes, and a point beyond which we can’t see.

库兹韦尔预测人工智能将在人类历史上引发奇点。当它在 2020 年代末的某个时候推出时，人工智能通过图灵测试将仅仅是这一奇点影响的一个脚注——他说，这将通过以下方式产生“人类经验现实的根本转变”： 2040年代。

Kurzweil predicts that artificial intelligence will induce a singularity in human history. When it rolls out, sometime in the late 2020s, an artificial intelligence’s passing of the Turing Test will be a mere footnote to this singularity’s impact—which will be, he says, to generate a “radical transformation of the reality of human experience” by the 2040s.

乌托邦？并不真地。库兹韦尔小心翼翼地指出了他的愿景的缺点。世界末日？谁知道呢——根据定义，奇点的后果对于我们前奇点论者来说是不可想象的。大的？你打赌。

Utopian? Not really. Kurzweil is careful to lay out the downsides of his vision. Apocalpytic? Who knows—the Singularity’s consequences are, by definition, inconceivable to us pre-Singularitarians. Big? You bet.

人们很容易取笑库兹韦尔的数字末世论的古怪维度。他通过每天服用 220 粒药片的饮食来延长生命的个人计划——腌制他五十多岁的湿器，直到奇点后的医学突破为完全永生打开大门——听起来更像是深夜商业宣传中的东西，而不是严肃的计划。科学家的选择。然而，迄今为止，库兹韦尔的技术未来展望记录已被证明是可靠的。他的声音很严肃。当他辩称“从短期来看，我们总是低估事情的困难程度，但从长远来看，我们低估了变化的巨大程度”时，他有历史的支持。

It’s easy to make fun of the wackier dimension of Kurzweil’s digital eschatology. His personal program of life extension via a diet of 220 pills per day—to pickle his fifty-something wetware until post-Singularity medical breakthroughs open the door to full immortality—sounds more like something out of a late-night commercial pitch than a serious scientist’s choice. Yet Kurzweil’s record of technological future-gazing has so far proven reliable; his voice is a serious one. And when he argues that “in the short term we always underestimate how hard things are, but in the long term we underestimate how big changes are,” he has history on his side.

但卡普尔认为库兹韦尔是完全错误的。他认为整个“强人工智能”项目，即从 20 世纪 50 年代至今用芯片和代码复制人类智能的努力，仍然是愚蠢的。卡普尔在一篇文章中解释了他对长赌注的看法，他写道，整个企业都误解并低估了人类的智力。

But Kapor thinks Kurzweil is dead wrong. He thinks the whole project of “strong artificial intelligence,” the effort from the 1950s to the present to replicate human intelligence in silicon and code, remains a folly. In an essay that explained his side of the Long Bet wager, Kapor wrote that the entire enterprise has misapprehended and underestimated human intelligence.

作为人类：

As humans:



我们是具身的生物；我们的身体以多种方式为我们奠定基础并定义我们的存在。

We are embodied creatures; our physicality grounds us and defines our existence in a myriad of ways.

我们都与周围的环境有着密切的联系；在塑造经验方面，对环境的感知和与环境的互动是认知的平等伙伴。

We are all intimately connected to and with the environment around us; perception of and interaction with the environment is the equal partner of cognition in shaping experience.

情感与认知一样或更基本；感受，无论是粗略的还是微妙的，都束缚并塑造了可想象事物的范围。

Emotion is as or more basic than cognition; feelings, gross and subtle, bound and shape the envelope of what is thinkable.

我们是有意识的生物，能够反思和自我意识；精神领域或超个人领域（选择一个不那么沉重的词）是我们可以成为的一部分，也是我们的一部分。

We are conscious beings, capable of reflection and self-awareness; the realm of the spiritual or trans-personal (to pick a less loaded word) is something we can be part of and which is part of us.



卡普尔写道，任何计算机怎么可能模仿一个存在于如此多维度的人类呢？或者愚弄一个能够“探究其交流典型人类本质的能力”的人类法官？

How, Kapor wrote, could any computer possibly impersonate a human being whose existence is spread across so many dimensions? Or fool a human judge able to “probe its ability to communicate about the quintessentially human”?

“最后，”他宣称，“我认为雷比任何机器都更聪明、更有能力。”

“In the end,” he declared, “I think Ray is smarter and more capable than any machine is going to be.”





卡普尔的论点在本质上符合常识（这句话体现了他的观点）。我们还需要四分之一个世纪才能知道他们的观点是否正确。

Kapor’s arguments jibe with common sense on a gut level (that very phrase embodies his point). It will be another quarter century before we know if they are right.

到那时我终于可以穿越一座新的海湾大桥了。Chandler 可能已经成为一个欣欣向荣的开源生态系统，也可能已经被埋葬在死代码墓地里。也许，只是也许，全世界程序员的大脑、才能和创造力会找到摆脱软件时代流沙的出路。

By then I should finally be traveling over a new Bay Bridge. Chandler may have become a thriving open source ecosystem or may have been interred in the dead-code graveyard. And maybe, just maybe, the brains and talents and creativity of the world’s programmers will have found a way out of the quicksand hold of software time.

但我不会做任何赌注。

But I’m not making any bets.

2005 年，在与 Kurzweil 下了长期赌注三年后，米奇·卡普尔 (Mitch Kapor) 在现实世界软件开发的深渊中摸爬滚打了多年，但他仍然坚持自己的赌注。

In 2005, three years after placing his Long Bet with Kurzweil, years spent clambering through the trenches of real-world software development, Mitch Kapor stands by his wager.

“我会立即对雷加倍努力，”他说。“我没有遇到任何站在他一边的人。现在，我不与奇点泡沫内的人交谈。但就普通软件从业者而言，无论他们是二十五岁、四十五岁还是六十五岁，没有人会站在他这一边。”

“I would double down with Ray in an instant,” he says. “I don’t run into anybody who takes his side. Now, I don’t talk to people inside the Singularity bubble. But just your average software practitioner, whether they’re twenty-five or forty-five or sixty-five—nobody takes his side of the bet.”

他睁大了眼睛，脸上闪现出一丝微笑——那是无辜的恶作剧，也可能是来之不易的经验。“你对软件了解得越多，你就越不会这么做。”

A half-smiling glint—of innocent mischief, and also perhaps of hard-earned experience—widens his eyes. “The more you know about software, the less you would do that.”

笔记

NOTES

本书中所有来自开源应用基金会工作人员的引述以及对 OSAF 场景的描述均来自个人观察或个人访谈。这些注释的相同版本（带有活动超链接）位于 http://www.dreamingincode.com。

All quotations from Open Source Applications Foundation staff and descriptions of scenes at OSAF in this book are drawn from personal observation or based on personal interviews. An identical version of these notes, with active hyperlinks, is located at http://www.dreamingincode.com.

关于副标题： “两打程序员”是对 Chandler 开发团队规模的粗略统计，该团队一开始规模要小得多，并且随着时间的推移而波动。“三年”代表我从 2003 年 1 月到 2005 年 12 月观察 Chandler 项目的时间。“4,732 个 bug”是在我完成本书手稿撰写之日输入 Chandler Bugzilla 数据库的 bug 数量；此后这个数字不断攀升。

About the subtitle: “Two dozen programmers” is a rough tally of the size of the Chandler development team, which started out much smaller and fluctuated over time. “Three years” represents the time I spent observing the Chandler project from January 2003 through December 2005. “4,732 bugs” is the number of bugs entered into the Chandler Bugzilla database on the date I completed writing the manuscript for this book; the number has since climbed.

O 章

CHAPTER O

软件时间

SOFTWARE TIME

苏美尔游戏（也称为 Hamurabi 或 Hammurabi）记录在维基百科中：http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hamurabi。该游戏的完整基本代码可以在 David H. Ahl 编辑的BASIC Computer Games（创意计算，1978 年）中找到。

The game Sumer (also known as Hamurabi or Hammurabi) is documented in Wikipedia at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hamurabi. Full Basic code for the game can be found in David H. Ahl, ed., BASIC Computer Games (Creative Computing, 1978).

Salon 的内容管理软件记录在在线杂志 Design Interact 的一篇文章中，网址为 http://www.designinteract.com/features_d/salon/index.htm。Chad Dickerson 在他的 InfoWorld 博客 (http://weblog.infoworld.com/dickerson/000170.htm) 中对此进行了介绍。

Salon’s content management software is documented in an article in the online magazine Design Interact at http://www.designinteract.com/features_d/salon/index.htm. Chad Dickerson wrote about it in his InfoWorld blog at http://weblog.infoworld.com/dickerson/000170.htm.

关于“心流”，请参阅 Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi，《心流：最佳体验心理学》（Harper Perennial，1991）。

On “flow,” see Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi, Flow: The Psychology of Optimal Experience (Harper Perennial, 1991).

计算机协会的 Hello World 页面位于 http://www2.latech.edu/~acm/HelloWorld.shtml。

The Association for Computing Machinery’s Hello World page is at http://www2.latech.edu/~acm/HelloWorld.shtml.

Knuth 的“软件很难”出现在他的“理论与实践”演讲的多个版本中，例如第 17 页。134 Donald E. Knuth，计算机科学论文精选（CSLI Publications/剑桥大学出版社，1996 年）。关于程序员为何从零开始计数的解释来自福特汉姆大学的 Jonathan Hayward 题为“So You’ve Hired a Hacker”的网页，网址为：http://jonathanscorner.com/writings/hacker/hacker4.htm。AP Lawrence 在 http://aplawrence.com/Basics/countfromzero.htm 上提供了更技术性的解释。

Knuth’s “Software is hard” appears in a number of versions of his “Theory and Practice” talk, for example on p. 134 of Donald E. Knuth, Selected Papers on Computer Science (CSLI Publications/Cambridge University Press, 1996). The explanation of why programmers count from zero is from a Web page titled So You’ve Hired a Hacker by Jonathan Hayward of Fordham University, at http://jonathanscorner.com/writings/hacker/hacker4.htm. A. P. Lawrence offers a more technical explanation at http://aplawrence.com/Basics/countfromzero.htm.

“也许你注意到我把这称为第 0 章”：程序员偶尔以第 0 章开始书籍的做法似乎起源于经典编程文本《C 编程语言》，作者为Brian W. Kernighan 和 Dennis M. Ritchie （普伦蒂斯霍尔，1978）。艾伦·乌尔曼 (Ellen Ullman) 还在她的散文集《靠近机器：技术癖及其不满》（City Lights，1997）中使用了它。

“Maybe you noticed that I’ve called this Chapter 0”: The occasional practice among programmers of starting books with a Chapter 0 appears to have originated with the classic programming text The C Programming Language, by Brian W. Kernighan and Dennis M. Ritchie (Prentice-Hall, 1978). Ellen Ullman also used it in her essay collection Close to the Machine: Technophilia and Its Discontents (City Lights, 1997).

有关新海湾大桥建设的详细信息请参见 http://www.newbaybridge.org/。

Details on the construction of the new Bay Bridge are from http://www.newbaybridge.org/.

美国国家标准与技术研究所的研究报告位于 http://www.nist.gov/public_affairs/releases/n02-10.htm。

The National Institute of Standards and Technology study is at http://www.nist.gov/public_affairs/releases/n02-10.htm.

“我们的文明靠软件运行”被广泛认为是 Bjarne Stroustrup 的作品。一个原始来源是他在德克萨斯农工大学教授的一门课程的幻灯片，他是该大学的教授：http://courses.cs.tamu.edu/petep/1_programming_06a.pdf。

“Our civilization runs on software” is widely attributed to Bjarne Stroustrup. One original source is in slides from a course he teaches at Texas A&M University where he is a professor: http://courses.cs.tamu.edu/petep/1_programming_06a.pdf.

莫里斯·威尔克斯 (Maurice Wilkes) 的引言摘自第 17 页。MV Wilkes, Memoirs of a Computer Pioneer (MIT Press, 1985) 的第 145 页，引自 M. Campbell-Kelly, “The Airy Tape: An Early Chapter on the History of Debugging,” Annals of the History of the History of Computer 14: 4 ( 1992），第 18-28 页。该文章可在 http://www.dcs.warwick.ac.uk/~mck/Personal/CampbellKelly1992.pdf 上找到。

The Maurice Wilkes quote is from p. 145 of M. V. Wilkes, Memoirs of a Computer Pioneer (MIT Press, 1985) as cited in M. Campbell-Kelly, “The Airy Tape: An Early Chapter on the History of Debugging,” Annals of the History of Computing 14: 4 (1992), pp. 18–28. That article is available at http://www.dcs.warwick.ac.uk/~mck/Personal/CampbellKelly1992.pdf.

Frederick P. Brooks，“没有灵丹妙药：软件工程的本质和意外”，计算机， 20：4（1987 年 4 月），第 10-19 页。还重印于《人月神话》周年纪念版（Addison Wesley，1995）。在线提供：http://www-inst.eecs.berkeley.edu/~maratb/readings/NoSilverBullet.htm。

Frederick P. Brooks, “No Silver Bullet: Essence and Accidents of Software Engineering,” Computer, 20: 4 (April 1987), pp. 10–19. Also reprinted in The Mythical Man-Month Anniversary Edition (Addison Wesley, 1995). Available online at http://www-inst.eecs.berkeley.edu/~maratb/readings/NoSilverBullet.htm.

第1章

CHAPTER 1

注定

DOOMED

Netscape 开发者是注定要失败的军团：参见 Netscape Dorm 的 Jamie Zawinski，网址为：http://www.jwz.org/gruntle/nscpdorm.htm。OSAF 工作人员参加的会议是 2003 年 7 月举行的 O'Reilly 开源会议。

Netscape developers as a legion of the doomed: See Jamie Zawinski, Netscape Dorm, at http://www.jwz.org/gruntle/nscpdorm.htm. The conference OSAF staffers attended was the O’Reilly Open Source Conference held in July 2003.

布鲁克斯定律可以在第 14 页找到。25 Frederick Brooks，《神话人月周年纪念版》（Addison Wesley，1995）。“正是努力的单位。。。欺骗性的神话”位于第 14 页。16.

Brooks’s Law can be found on p. 25 of Frederick Brooks, The Mythical Man-Month Anniversary Edition (Addison Wesley, 1995). “The very unit of effort . . . deceptive myth” is on p. 16.

“男人和月份是可以互换的”：布鲁克斯，第 17 页。16.

“Men and months are interchangeable”: Brooks, p. 16.

“再生调度灾难”：同上，第 17 页。21.

“Regenerative scheduling disaster”: Ibid., p. 21.

“这就是疯狂”：同上，第 17 页。25.

“Therein lies madness”: Ibid., p. 25.

“生孩子需要……” 。。”：同上，第 14 页。17.

“The bearing of a child takes . . . ”: Ibid., p. 17.

“概念完整性”：同上，第 17 页。42.

“conceptual integrity”: Ibid., p. 42.

比尔·盖茨 (Bill Gates) 对 GPL 作为吃豆人 (Pac-Man) 的评论在 2001 年被广泛报道，例如 CNET News.com，网址为 http://news.com.com/2100-1001-268667.htm。

Bill Gates’s comments on the GPL as Pac-Man were widely reported in 2001, for instance on CNET News.com at http://news.com.com/2100-1001-268667.htm.

Torvalds 的“只是一个爱好”这句话出自他 1991 年向 comp.os.minix 新闻组宣布 Linux 项目的消息。它在网上的许多地方都有存档，例如http://www.linux.org/people/linus_post.htm。

Torvalds’s “Just a hobby” quotation is from his 1991 message announcing the Linux project to the comp.os.minix newsgroup. It is archived many places online, e.g. at http://www.linux.org/people/linus_post.htm.

“纯粹主义者称之为 GNU-Linux”：维基百科对此问题有很好的描述，网址为 http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GNU/Linux_naming_conference

。“言论自由”与“免费啤酒”的争论概述于 http://www.gnu.org/philosophy/free-sw.htm。

“that purists call GNU-Linux”: a good account of this issue is in Wikipedia at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GNU/Linux_naming_

controversy. The “Free speech” vs. “Free beer” argument is outlined at http://www.gnu.org/ philosophy/free-sw.htm.

《大教堂与集市》中的所有引文均可在在线版本中找到：http://www.catb.org/~esr/writings/cathedral-bazaar/cathedral-bazaar/index.htm。

All quotations from “The Cathedral and the Bazaar” may be found in the online version at http://www.catb.org/~esr/writings/cathedral-bazaar/cathedral-bazaar/index.htm.

Apache 市场份额由 Netcraft 调查跟踪，网址为 http://news.netcraft.com/archives/web_server_survey.htm

。

Apache market share is tracked by the Netcraft survey at http://news.netcraft.com/archives/web_server_

survey.htm.

“维护的总成本”：布鲁克斯，第 14 页。121.

“The total cost of maintaining”: Brooks, p. 121.

“任何人都可以使用它、修复它并扩展它”：同上，第 17 页。6.

“anyone may use it, fix it, and extend it”: Ibid., p. 6.

“未完全交付”：同上，第 14 页。8.

“incompletely delivered”: Ibid., p. 8.

Michael Toy 2003 年 6 月 26 日的博客条目位于 http://blogs.osafoundation.org/blogotomy/2003_

06.htm。

Michael Toy’s blog entry from June 26, 2003, is at http://blogs.osafoundation.org/blogotomy/2003_

06.htm.

“棒球经理认识到”：布鲁克斯，第 17 页。155.

“A baseball manager recognizes”: Brooks, p. 155.

第2章

CHAPTER 2

议程的灵魂

THE SOUL OF AGENDA

“卖糖水”：史蒂夫·乔布斯向约翰·斯卡利的推销已成为传奇。PBS 纪录片《书呆子的胜利》中的文字记录（斯卡利本人在其中进行了报道）是相对主要的来源：http://www.pbs.org/nerds/part3.htm。

“sell sugar water”: Steve Jobs’s pitch to John Sculley has become the stuff of legend. The transcript from the PBS documentary Triumph of the Nerds, in which Sculley himself reports it, is a relatively primary source: http://www.pbs.org/nerds/part3.htm.

卡普尔的估计为 1 亿美元：《商业周刊》， 1988 年 5 月 30 日，第 14 页。92.

Kapor’s estimated $100 million: Business Week, May 30, 1988, p. 92.



“理解这一点很重要”：David Gans对Kapor 的采访位于 http://www.eff.org/Misc/Publications/John_Perry_Barlow/HTML/barlow_and_kapor_in_wired_

Interview.htm。

“It’s important to understand”: David Gans’s interview with Kapor is at http://www.eff.org/Misc/Publications/John_Perry

_Barlow/HTML/barlow_and_kapor_in_wired_

interview.htm.

“让自己从自己的成功中解脱出来”：1987 年 1 月 1 日，卡普尔在《Inc.》上接受采访。

“extricating myself from my own success”: Kapor interview in Inc., January 1, 1987.

Lotus Agenda：该计划的一般背景信息收集于 http://home.neo.rr.com/pim/alinks.htm。该程序仍可通过 http://www.bobnewell.net/nucleus/bnewell.php?itemid=186 获取。

Lotus Agenda: general background on the program is collected at http://home.neo.rr.com/pim/alinks.htm. The program is still available via http://www.bobnewell.net/nucleus/bnewell.php?itemid=186.

原团队的开发文档概述了 Agenda 背后的原则，可从 http://home.neo.rr.com/pim/article1.htm 获取。詹姆斯·法洛斯 (James Fallows) 关于议程的文章于 1992 年 5 月发表在《大西洋月刊》上。

The principles behind Agenda are outlined in a development document from the original team, available at http://home.neo.rr.com/pim/article1.htm. James Fallows’s article on Agenda appeared in the Atlantic in May 1992.

“整个系统在科学中构建”：Linus Torvalds，引用于《商业周刊》， 2004 年 8 月 18 日，网址：http://www.businessweek.com/technology/content/aug2004/tc20040818_1593.htm

。

“In science the whole system builds”: Linus Torvalds, quoted in Business Week, August 18, 2004, at http://www.businessweek.com/technology/content

/aug2004/tc20040818_1593.htm.

万尼瓦尔·布什 (Vannevar Bush) 的《正如我们所想》于 1945 年 7 月首次出现在《大西洋月刊》上。可在 http://www.theatlantic.com/doc/194507/bush 上获取。我对 Douglas Engelbart 作品的描述借鉴了 Bootstrap Institute 网站 http://www.bootstrap.org/ 上收集的他的作品以及 Thierry Bardini, Bootstrapping (Stanford University Press, 2000)中的描述；霍华德·莱因戈尔德（Howard Rheingold），《思维工具》（Simon & Schuster，1985）；和约翰·马尔科夫（John Markoff），《睡鼠说了什么》（Viking，2005）。

Vannevar Bush’s “As We May Think” first appeared in the Atlantic in July 1945. It is available at http://www.theatlantic.com/doc/194507/bush. My account of Douglas Engelbart’s work draws on readings from his work collected at the Bootstrap Institute Web site at http://www.bootstrap.org/, as well as the accounts in Thierry Bardini, Bootstrapping (Stanford University Press, 2000); Howard Rheingold, Tools for Thought (Simon & Schuster, 1985); and John Markoff, What the Dormouse Said (Viking, 2005).

Engelbart 1968 年的演示视频位于 http://sloan.stanford.edu/mousesite/1968Demo.htm。

The video of Engelbart’s 1968 demo is at http://sloan.stanford.edu/mousesite/1968Demo.htm.

“存储想法，研究它们”：来自专门介绍恩格尔巴特想法的隐形革命网站，网址为：http://www.invisiblerevolution.net/nls.htm。

“store ideas, study them”: From the Invisible Revolution Web site, devoted to Engelbart’s ideas, at http://www.invisiblerevolution.net/nls.htm.

“成功的成果是可以利用的”：来自《先增强谁？》Engelbart 1962 年论文“增强人类智力：概念框架”的部分，网址为：http://sloan.stanford.edu/mousesite/EngelbartPapers/B5_F18_ConceptFrameworkPt4.htm

。

“successful achievements can be utilized”: From the “Whom to Augment First?” section of Engelbart’s 1962 paper, “Augmenting Human Intellect: A Conceptual Framework,” at http://sloan.stanford.edu/mousesite/EngelbartPapers

/B5_F18_ConceptFrameworkPt4.htm.

“改进过程的改进”：Bootstrap Institute 主页 http://www.bootstrap.org/。

“an improving of the improvement process”: Bootstrap Institute home page at http://www.bootstrap.org/.

“积极研究的反馈”：Engelbart 1962 年论文“增强人类智力”的“基本再生特征”部分，网址为 http://sloan.stanford.edu/mousesite/EngelbartPapers/B5_F18_ConceptFramework Pt4.htm

。

“the feeding back of positive research”: In the “Basic Regenerative Feature” section of Engelbart’s 1962 paper, “Augmenting Human Intellect,” at http:// sloan.stanford.edu/mousesite/EngelbartPapers/

B5_F18_ConceptFramework Pt4.htm.

“一些惊讶的访客”：Bardini，Bootstrapping，第 14 页。145.

“Some astonished visitors”: Bardini, Bootstrapping, p. 145.

“Engelbart，无论好坏”：Alan Kay，引自 Bardini，Bootstrapping，第 14 页。215.

“Engelbart, for better or worse”: Alan Kay, quoted in Bardini, Bootstrapping,p. 215.

Jaron Lanier 关于马文·明斯基的故事来自 1998 年斯坦福大学“恩格尔巴特未完成的革命”研讨会的视频，可在 http://unrev.stanford.edu/ 上获取。

Jaron Lanier’s story about Marvin Minsky is from a video of the “Engelbart’s Unfinished Revolution” seminar at Stanford, 1998, available at http://unrev.stanford.edu/.

2005 年 1 月 14 日的《纽约时报》详细叙述了 FBI 的软件灾难，网址为：http://www.nytimes.com/2005/03/09/politics/09

fbi.htm?ex=1268110800&en=efa63369bfa14be8&ei=5090

&partner =rssuserland。IEEE Spectrum在其 2005 年 9 月号中分析了该故障，网址为：http://www.spectrum.ieee.org/sep05/1455。

The FBI’s software disasters were recounted in the January 14, 2005, New York Times, available at http://www.nytimes.com/2005/03/09/politics/09

fbi.htm?ex=1268110800&en=efa63369bfa14be8&ei=5090

&partner=rssuserland. IEEE Spectrum analyzed the failure in its September 2005 issue, at http://www.spectrum.ieee.org/sep05/1455.

2003 年 12 月 11 日的《纽约时报》记录了 IRS 的软件问题，网址为 http://www.nytimes.com/2003/12/11/business/11

irs.htm?ex=1386478800&en=39d69ddfd8171e0c&ei=5007

&partner =用户土地。

《CIO 杂志》自 2004 年 4 月 1 日起的详细报告位于 http://www.cio.com/archive/040104/irs.htm?printversion=yes。

The IRS’s software troubles were chronicled in the December 11, 2003, New York Times, available at http://www.nytimes.com/2003/12/11/business/11

irs.htm?ex=1386478800&en=39d69ddfd8171e0c&ei=5007

&partner=USERLAND.

CIO Magazine’s detailed report from April 1, 2004, is at http://www.cio.com/archive/040104/irs.htm?printversion=yes.

英国养老金制度崩溃在英国得到了广泛报道，例如2004 年 11 月 26 日《卫报》

的这篇文章：http://politics.guardian.co.uk/homeaffairs/story/0,11026, 1360163,00.htm 。

The U.K. pension system crash was widely reported in the United Kingdom, for instance in this Guardian article from November 26, 2004: http:// politics.guardian.co.uk/homeaffairs/story/0,11026,

1360163,00.htm.

麦当劳创新灾难在2003 年 7 月 2 日的《Baseline》中进行了探讨，网址为：http://www.baselinemag.com/article2/0,3959,119

1808,00.asp。

The McDonald’s Innovate disaster was explored in Baseline, July 2, 2003, at http://www.baselinemag.com/article2/0,3959,119

1808,00.asp.

Computerworld于 2004 年 8 月 18 日报道了福特 Everest 系统的故事，网址为：http://www.computerworld.com/softwaretopics/erp/story/0,10801,95335,00.htm

。

Computerworld covered the Ford Everest system’s story on August 18, 2004, at http://www.computerworld.com/softwaretopics/

erp/story/0,10801,95335,00.htm.

Standish Group 的 CHAOS 报告数据收集于 http://www.standishgroup.com/public.php，包括 1994 年的原始报告和一些更新。

The Standish Group’s CHAOS report data is collected at http://www.standishgroup.com/public.php, including the original 1994 report and several updates.

Robert L. Glass，《软件失控》（Prentice Hall，1998 年）。爱德华·尤登，《死亡行军》（Prentice Hall，1997）。Robert N. Britcher，《软件的极限》（Addison Wesley，1999）。

Robert L. Glass, Software Runaways (Prentice Hall, 1998). Edward Yourdon, Death March (Prentice Hall, 1997). Robert N. Britcher, The Limits of Software (Addison Wesley, 1999).

“可能是最伟大的”：Bricher，《软件的限制》，第 14 页。163.

“may have been the greatest”: Britcher, The Limits of Software, p. 163.

“就像更换汽车发动机一样”：同上，第 17 页。181.

“like replacing the engine on a car”: Ibid., p. 181.

“无法编写该软件”：同上，第 17 页。185.

“The software could not be written”: Ibid., p. 185.

“你可以读《伊利亚特》”：同上，第 17 页。172.

“you can read the Iliad”: Ibid., p. 172.

“我认识的一位工程师”：同上，第 168-69 页。

“One engineer I know”: Ibid., pp. 168–69.

“所有程序员都是乐观主义者”：Frederick Brooks，The Mythical Man-Month Anniversary Edition（Addison Wesley，1995），第 14 页。14.

“All programmers are optimists”: Frederick Brooks, The Mythical Man-Month Anniversary Edition (Addison Wesley, 1995), p. 14.

卡普尔在 1990 年 PC 论坛会议上发表了他的“软件设计宣言”。后来它发表在 Terry Winograd 的《Bringing Design to Software》（Addison Wesley，1996 年）中。可以在 http://hci.stanford.edu/bds/1-kapor.htm 找到。

Kapor delivered his “Software Design Manifesto” at the 1990 PC Forum conference. It was later published in Terry Winograd, Bringing Design to Software (Addison Wesley, 1996). It can be found at http://hci.stanford.edu/bds/1-kapor.htm.

“我们取消了计划”：摘自“痛苦的诞生：为米奇·卡普尔公司创建新软件是一项艰巨的任务”，作者：Paul B. Carroll，《华尔街日报》， 1990 年 5 月 11 日。

“We took the plan out”: From “Painful Birth: Creating New Software Was Agonizing Task for Mitch Kapor Firm” by Paul B. Carroll, Wall Street Journal, May 11, 1990.

第3章

CHAPTER 3

原型和 Python

PROTOTYPES AND PYTHON

“二十人的团队”：艺术家 Chris Cobb 在旧金山 Adob​​e 书店的项目记录在 McSweeney 的网站上：http://www.mcsweeneys.net/links/events/chriscobb。

嗯。

“a crew of twenty people”: Artist Chris Cobb’s project at the Adobe Bookstore in San Francisco is chronicled at the McSweeney’s Web site at http://www.mcsweeneys.net/links/events/chriscobb.

htm.

有关语义 Web 和 RDF 的信息位于 http://www.w3.org/2001/sw/。

Information about the Semantic Web and RDF is at http://www.w3.org/2001/sw/.

“计划扔掉一个”和“承诺交付一个一次性的”：Frederick Brooks，《人月神话》（Addison Wesley，1995），第 115-16 页。

“plan to throw one away” and “promise to deliver a throwaway”: Frederick Brooks, The Mythical Man-Month (Addison Wesley, 1995), pp. 115–16.

“程序员就像诗人”：同上，第 17 页。7.

“The programmer, like the poet”: Ibid., p. 7.

“疯子、情人和诗人”：威廉·莎士比亚，《仲夏夜之梦》，第五幕，sc。我。

“The lunatic, the lover, and the poet”: William Shakespeare, A Midsummer Night’s Dream, Act V, sc. i.

“组合多个的过程”：该短语来自维基百科对“抽象（计算机科学）”的定义。在撰写本文时，该短语不再出现在该页面上，但可以在这里找到：http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Abstraction_%28computer_science%29&oldid=12117920。

“The process of combining multiple”: The phrase is from Wikipedia’s definition of “Abstraction (computer science).” At the time of writing this phrase no longer appears on that page, but it may be found here: http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Abstraction_%28computer_science%29&oldid=12117920.

“这就是程序员所做的”：Eric Sink，“The .Net Abstraction Pile”，博客文章，位于 http://biztech.ericsink.com/Abstraction_Pile.htm。

“This is what programmers do”: Eric Sink, “The .Net Abstraction Pile,” blog entry at http://biztech.ericsink.com/Abstraction_Pile.htm.

“靠近机器”：Ellen Ullman 的书《靠近机器》（City Lights，1997 年）的标题。

“close to the machine”: Title of Ellen Ullman’s book Close to the Machine (City Lights, 1997).

“几乎消除编码和调试”：这句话出自 1954 年一份报告的第 2 页，题为“IBM 数学公式翻译系统 FORTRAN 的初步报告，规范”，后来在 John Backus 的“The History of Fortran I, II”中引用，和 III，” IEEE 计算史年鉴20：4（1998 年 10 月至 12 月）第 68-78 页，可从 http://doi.ieeecomputersociety.org/10.1109/85.728232 获取。

“virtually eliminate coding and debugging”: The words are from page 2 of a 1954 report titled “Preliminary Report, Specifications for the IBM Mathematical FORmula TRANslating System, FORTRAN,” as cited later in John Backus, “The History of Fortran I, II, and III,” IEEE Annals of the History of Computing 20: 4 (Oct.–Dec., 1998) pp. 68–78, available at http://doi.ieeecomputersociety.org/10.1109/85.728232.

“与机器肉搏战”：史蒂夫·洛尔（Steve Lohr）在《转到：数学专业的学生、桥牌选手、工程师、国际象棋奇才、特立独行的科学家和反传统者——创造软件革命的程序员的故事》中引用了巴克斯的这句话（基础知识） ，2001），p。13.

“hand to hand combat with the machine”: Backus’s phrase is quoted in Steve Lohr, Go To: The Story of the Math Majors, Bridge Players, Engineers, Chess Wizards, Maverick Scientists and Iconoclasts—the Programmers Who Created the Software Revolution (Basic, 2001), p. 13.

英特尔网站概述了摩尔定律：http://www.intel.com/technology/silicon/mooreslaw/。

Moore’s Law is outlined at Intel’s Web site: http://www.intel.com/technology/silicon/mooreslaw/.

Guido van Rossum 的引述摘自 2005 年 2 月 17 日在加利福尼亚州帕洛阿尔托软件开发论坛上的一次演讲。音频可在 http://www.itconversations.com/shows/detail545.htm 上获取。

Quotations from Guido van Rossum are from a talk given February 17, 2005, at the Software Development Forum in Palo Alto, California. Audio is available at http://www.itconversations.com/shows/detail545.htm.

Larry Wall 的演讲是在 2004 年 7 月于俄勒冈州波特兰举行的 O'Reilly 开源大会上进行的。文本可在 http://www.perl.com/pub/a/2004/08/18/onion.htm 上获取。

Larry Wall’s talk was at the O’Reilly Open Source Conference, Portland, Oregon, July 2004. Text is available at http://www.perl.com/pub/a/2004/08/18/onion.htm.

一位观察者的描述：该观察者是 2004 年 8 月 6 日 NTK 时事通讯中的丹尼·奥布莱恩 (Danny O'Brien)，网址为：http://www.ntk.net/2004/08/06/。

one observer’s characterization: The observer is Danny O’Brien in his NTK newsletter from August 6, 2004, at http://www.ntk.net/2004/08/06/.

“我花了几个星期的时间尝试”：Benjamin Pierce 在 2001 年 6 月的私人邮件列表上的一条消息中；完整引用已通过电子邮件确认给作者。

“I spent a few weeks trying”: Benjamin Pierce in a June 2001 message on a private mailing list; full quote confirmed in email to author.

“Guido 的时间机器”：Eric Raymond 的行话文件在 http://www.catb.org/jargon/html/G/Guido.htm 中对其进行了定义。

“Guido’s time machine”: Eric Raymond’s Jargon File defines it at http://www.catb.org/jargon/html/G/Guido.htm.

“当你编程时，你就会花钱”：Paul Graham，“Python 悖论”，2004 年 8 月，网址：http://www.paulgraham.com/pypar.htm。

“When you program, you spend”: Paul Graham, “The Python Paradox,” August 2004, at http://www.paulgraham.com/pypar.htm.

Vaporware 名人堂：Jon Zilber ，MacUser， 1990 年 1 月 1 日。

Vaporware Hall of Fame: Jon Zilber in MacUser, January 1, 1990.

Dan Gillmor 的文章：“软件创意可能只是疯狂到可以工作”，圣何塞水星报， 2002 年 10 月 20 日。

Dan Gillmor’s piece: “Software Idea May Be Just Crazy Enough to Work,” San Jose Mercury News, October 20, 2002.

最初的 Slashdot 发布和讨论位于 http://slashdot.org/articles/02/10/20/1827210.shtml?tid=99。OSAF 邮件列表的完整档案可访问 http://www.osafoundation.org/mailing_lists.htm。

The original Slashdot posting and discussion is at http://slashdot.org/articles/02/10/20/1827210.shtml?tid=99. Complete archives of OSAF’s mailing lists can be accessed at http://www.osafoundation.org/mailing_lists.htm.

“我们将首先发布代码”：Kapor 于 2002 年 11 月 14 日发表的博客文章，网址为 http://blogs.osafoundation.org/mitch/000044.htm#

000044。

“We will first put out code”: Kapor’s blog post from November 14, 2002, is at http://blogs.osafoundation.org/mitch/000044.htm#

000044.

第 4 章

CHAPTER 4

乐高乐园

LEGO LAND

David/Rys McCusker 的博客帖子已不再在线。

David/Rys McCusker’s blog postings are no longer online.

“未来，将构建程序”：James Noble，“乐高假说”，幻灯片摘自 2004 年 9 月 JAOO 会议上的演讲，网址为：http://www.jaoo.org/jaoo2004/speakers/show_speaker.jsp

? oid=58。James Noble 和 Robert Biddle 反驳乐高假说的研究摘自 James Noble、Robert Biddle、Alex Potanin 和 Marcus Frean，“面向对象程序中的无标度几何”，Communications of the ACM，2005 年 5 月，可在 http : // ://portal.acm.org/itation.cfm?id=1060716 以及 http://www.mcs.vuw.ac.nz/~marcus/manuscripts/CACM.pdf

。

“In the future, programs will be built”: James Noble, “The Lego Hypothesis,” slides from talk at JAOO Conference, September 2004, at http://www.jaoo.org/jaoo2004/speakers/show_

speaker.jsp?oid=58. The account of James Noble and Robert Biddle’s research disproving the Lego hypothesis is drawn from James Noble, Robert Biddle, Alex Potanin, and Marcus Frean, “Scale-free Geometry in OO Programs,” Communications of the ACM, May 2005, available at http://portal.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=1060716 and also http://www.mcs.vuw.ac.nz/~marcus/manuscripts/

CACM.pdf.

“以便每个用户”：Maurice Wilkes，回忆录，引自 James Noble 和 Robert Biddle，“No Name：Just Notes on Software Reuse”，网址：http://www.mcs.vuw.ac.nz/comp/出版物/CS-TR-03-11.abs.htm。

“in order that every user”: Maurice Wilkes, Memoirs, as cited in James Noble and Robert Biddle, “No Name: Just Notes on Software Reuse,” at http://www.mcs.vuw.ac.nz/comp/Publications/CS-TR-03-11.abs.htm.

Robert Glass 对“小型重用”的观察来自 Robert L. Glass，《软件工程的事实与谬论》（Addison Wesley，2003 年），第 43-49 页。

Robert Glass’s observations on “reuse-in-the-small” are from Robert L. Glass, Facts and Fallacies of Software Engineering (Addison Wesley, 2003), pp. 43–49.

“这不是一个意志问题”：同上，第 17 页。47.

“It is not a will problem”: Ibid., p. 47.

“从孤独转变编程”：这句话以及随后 Brad Cox 的引述均来自 Cox 的“规划软件工业革命”，IEEE Software，1990 年 11 月，也可在 http://virtualschool.edu/cox/pub/PSIR/ 上找到。

“transform programming from a solitary”: This and later quotes from Brad Cox are from Cox’s “Planning the Software Industrial Revolution,” IEEE Software, November 1990, and also at http://virtualschool.edu/cox/pub/PSIR/.

Brad Cox，《超级发行：电子前沿的对象作为财产》（Addison Wesley，1995）。

Brad Cox, Superdistribution: Objects as Property on the Electronic Frontier (Addison Wesley, 1995).

“他们确实有一个经济模型”：作者对 Brad Cox 的采访，2005 年 6 月。

“They do have an economic model”: Author interview with Brad Cox, June 2005.

“不幸的是，大多数程序员喜欢编程”：Larry L. Constantine，Constantine on Peopleware（Prentice Hall，1995），第 123-24 页。

“Unfortunately, most programmers like to program”: Larry L. Constantine, Constantine on Peopleware (Prentice Hall, 1995), pp. 123–24.

“跟上可用的内容”：Ward Cunningham，Jon Udell 在他的InfoWorld博客中引用，网址为 http://weblog.infoworld.com/udell/2004/05/21.htm

#a1006。

“Keeping up with what’s available”: Ward Cunningham, quoted by Jon Udell in his InfoWorld blog at http://weblog.infoworld.com/udell/2004/05/21.htm

#a1006.

“人们一直假装他们可以”：特德·尼尔森的这句话在网络上广泛流传，而“intertwingle”这个词在尼尔森的著作中经常出现，但完整引用的原始出处却很模糊。引用的一个来源是p。他的书《Computer Lib/Dream Machines》第一版（1974 年）第 45 节。关于引用的起源有两个讨论：http://www.bootstrap.org/dkr/discussion/3260.htm 和 http://listserv.linguistlist.org/cgi-bin/wa?A2=ind0204b&L=ads-l&D =0&P=5140。

“People keep pretending they can”: These lines by Ted Nelson are widely distributed on the Net, and the word intertwingle appears frequently in Nelson’s writing, but the original source of the full quotation is obscure. One source cited is p. 45 of the first (1974) edition of his book Computer Lib/Dream Machines. There are two discussions of the quote’s origins at http://www.bootstrap.org/dkr/discussion/3260.htm and http://listserv.linguistlist.org/cgi-bin/wa?A2=ind0204b&L=ads-l&D=0&P=5140.

“我一直在提到 Chandler”：Kapor 在 2003 年 3 月 29 日发表的博客文章位于 http://blogs.osafoundation.org/mitch/000139.htm#

000139。

“I’ve been referring to Chandler”: Kapor’s blog posting from March 29, 2003, is at http://blogs.osafoundation.org/mitch/000139.htm#

000139.

第 5 章

CHAPTER 5

管理狗和极客

MANAGING DOGS AND GEEKS

“它们与其他狗相处得很好”：拉布拉多犬的描述来自http://www.dogbreedinfo.com/labradoodle.htm。

“They get along well with other dogs”: The labradoodle description is from http://www.dogbreedinfo.com/labradoodle.htm.

“我们已经太大了”：来自 Mitch Kapor 的博客文章《制定设计决策：一些原则》，2002 年 12 月 29 日，网址：http://blogs.osafoundation.org/mitch/000097.htm#

000097。

“We are already too large”: From Mitch Kapor’s blog posting, Making Design Decisions: Some Principles, December 29, 2002, at http://blogs.osafoundation.org/mitch/000097.htm#

000097.

“我的痛苦的名字”：Rick Kitts，“我知道为什么软件很糟糕”，2004 年 2 月 7 日，网址：http://www.artima.com/weblogs/viewpost.jsp?thread=32878。

“The name for my pain”: Rick Kitts, “I Know Why Software Sucks,” February 7, 2004, at http://www.artima.com/weblogs/viewpost.jsp?thread=32878.

稻草人图像不再出现在 Michael Toy 的主页上，但可以在 http://toyblog.typepad.com/about.htm 上找到。

The scarecrow image is no longer at Michael Toy’s home page, but it can be found at http://toyblog.typepad.com/about.htm.

“从程序员到经理的转变”：这是 Toy 的 Blogotomy 博客标题的一部分，网址为 http://blogs.osafoundation.org/blogotomy/。

“The transition from programmer to manager”: This is part of the title of Toy’s Blogotomy blog at http://blogs.osafoundation.org/blogotomy/.

“迈克尔是最后一个人”：这是http://www.undignified.org/people.htm。

“Michael is the last person”: This is at http://www.undignified.org/people.htm.

“我们所处的基础”：Michael Toy 博客文章，2003 年 6 月 26 日，网址：http://blogs.osafoundation.org/blogotomy/000248.htm。

“the ground on which we are”: Michael Toy blog posting, June 26, 2003, at http://blogs.osafoundation.org/blogotomy/000248.htm.

“管理是关于人的”：彼得·德鲁克，“管理作为社会功能和自由艺术”，载于《德鲁克精要》（哈珀商业出版社，2001 年），第 17 页。10.

“Management is about human beings”: Peter Drucker, “Management as Social Function and Liberal Art,” in The Essential Drucker (Harper Business, 2001), p. 10.

Bill Atkinson 的“-2000”代码行：出自 Andy Hertzfeld，《硅谷革命：Mac 制造过程的疯狂伟大故事》（O'Reilly，2005 年），第 11 页。65. 另见 http://www.folklore.org/StoryView.py?project=Macintosh&story=Negative_2000_Lines_

Of_Code.txt。

Bill Atkinson’s “-2000” lines of code: From Andy Hertzfeld, Revolution in the Valley: The Insanely Great Story of How the Mac Was Made (O’Reilly, 2005),p. 65. Also at http://www.folklore.org/StoryView.py?project=Macintosh&story=Negative_2000_Lines_

Of_Code.txt.

“徘徊管理”：Tom Peters 在 2005 年 9 月 6 日发表的博客文章中，网址为：http://www.tompeters.com/entries.php?note=008106.php。

“management by wandering around”: Tom Peters in a blog posting from September 6, 2005, at http://www.tompeters.com/entries.php?note=008106.php.

“凭借制造业、军队和传统硬件”：Watts Humphrey，“大型软件项目为何失败”，CrossTalk，2005 年 3 月，网址：http://www.stsc.hill.af.mil/CrossTalk/2005/03/0503

Humphrey .htm。

“With manufacturing, armies, and traditional hardware”: Watts Humphrey, “Why Big Software Projects Fail,” CrossTalk, March 2005, at http://www.stsc.hill.af.mil/CrossTalk/2005/03/0503

Humphrey.htm.

根据 wordorigins.org，geek “是geck的变体， geck 是一个起源于低地德语/荷兰语的术语，可以追溯到 1511 年的英语中。它的意思是傻瓜、傻瓜或傻瓜。” 盖克出现在《第十二夜》第五幕第一场；一个变体，geeke，出现在《辛白林》第五幕第四场中。

According to wordorigins.org, geek “is a variant of geck, a term of Low German/Dutch origin that dates in English to 1511. It means a fool, simpleton, or dupe.” Geck appears in Twelfth Night, Act V, scene i; a variant, geeke, turns up in Cymbeline, Act V, scene iv.

“吃（计算机）错误的人”：计算机极客的原始定义来自埃里克·雷蒙德编辑，《新黑客词典》，第 3 版。（麻省理工学院出版社，1996 年），第 17 页。120.

“one who eats (computer) bugs”: The original definition of computer geek is from Eric Raymond, ed., The New Hacker’s Dictionary, 3rd ed. (MIT Press, 1996), p. 120.

“极客：做出选择的人”：在线行话文件（黑客词典的来源）中极客的当前定义位于http://www.catb.org/jargon/html/G/geek.htm。

“Geek: A person who has chosen”: The current definition of geek from the online Jargon File (source of the Hacker’s Dictionary) is at http://www.catb.org/jargon/html/G/geek.htm.

“对某事进行极客”：来自 Neal Stephenson，“Turn On, Tune In, Veg Out”，《纽约时报》， 2005 年 6 月 17 日，另见 http://www.nytimes.com/2005/06/17 /opinion/17

stephenson.htm?ex=1276660800&en=a693ccc4ec008424&ei=5090

&partner=rssuserland&emc=rss。

“To geek out on something”: From Neal Stephenson, “Turn On, Tune In, Veg Out,” New York Times, June 17, 2005, and also at http://www.nytimes.com/2005/06/17/opinion/17

stephenson.htm?ex=1276660800&en=a693ccc4ec008424&ei=5090

&partner=rssuserland&emc=rss.

“我蜥蜴大脑中一些疯狂的褶皱”：Merlin Mann 在他的 43 Folders 博客上，2004 年 9 月 15 日，网址：http://www.43folders.com/2004/09/15/home-comforts-illusterated-housekeeping-pr0n/ 。

“Some deranged fold of my lizard brain”: Merlin Mann on his 43 Folders blog, September 15, 2004, at http://www.43folders.com/2004/09/15/home-comforts-illustrated-housekeeping-pr0n/.

Jennifer Tucker、Abby Mackness、Hile Rutledge，“信息技术团队的人类动力学”，Crosstalk，2004 年 2 月，网址：http://www.stsc.hill.af.mil/crossTalk/2004/02/0402

Tucker.htm 。

Jennifer Tucker, Abby Mackness, Hile Rutledge, “The Human Dynamics of Information Technology Teams,” in Crosstalk, February 2004, at http://www.stsc.hill.af.mil/crossTalk/2004/02/0402

Tucker.htm.

“很多人都这么认为”：Abby Mackness 在 2004 年 4 月盐湖城系统与软件技术大会上的演讲。

“A lot of people feel that”: Abby Mackness presentation at the Systems & Software Technology Conference, Salt Lake City, April 2004.

Steve Silberman，“极客综合症”，《连线》， 2001 年 12 月，网址：http://www.wired.com/wired/archive/9.12/aspergers

_pr.htm。

Steve Silberman, “The Geek Syndrome,” Wired, December 2001, at http://www.wired.com/wired/archive/9.12/aspergers

_pr.htm.

“学生的典型行为”：Gerald Weinberg，《计算机编程心理学》，银周年纪念版（Dorset House，1998 年），第 14 页。50.

“The typical behavior of a student”: Gerald Weinberg, The Psychology of Computer Programming, Silver Anniversary Edition (Dorset House, 1998), p. 50.

“我想，好吧，我正在运行这个存储库”：Ward Cunningham 在 OOPSLA 会议上的演讲，2004 年 10 月，温哥华，不列颠哥伦比亚省

“I figured, OK, I’m running this repository”: Ward Cunningham’s talk at the OOPSLA Conference, October 2004, Vancouver, B.C.

波特兰模式存储库位于 http://c2.com/ppr/。

The Portland Pattern Repository is at http://c2.com/ppr/.

OSAF 维基位于 http://wiki.osafoundation.org。

The OSAF wiki is at http://wiki.osafoundation.org.

布鲁克斯对巴别塔的讨论见于《神话人月周年纪念版》（Addison Wesley，1995），第 17 页。74.

Brooks’s discussion of the Tower of Babel is in The Mythical Man-Month Anniversary Edition (Addison Wesley, 1995), p. 74.

“存在一些阴暗面”：James Gosling，“Sharpen the Axe: The Dark Side”，2005 年 1 月 4 日的博客文章，网址为 http://today.java.net/jag/page13.htm#106。

“There are a couple of dark sides”: James Gosling, “Sharpen the Axe: The Dark Side,” blog entry from January 4, 2005, at http://today.java.net/jag/page13.htm#106.

有关牦牛剃毛的行话文件条目位于 http://www.faqs.org/docs/jargon/Y/yak-shaving.htm。

The Jargon File entry on yak shaving is at http://www.faqs.org/docs/jargon/Y/yak-shaving.htm.

第 6 章

CHAPTER 6

完成设计

GETTING DESIGN DONE

《经济学人》于 2004 年 10 月 28 日在 http://www.economist.com/displaystory.cfm?story_id=3307430 上详细报道了“妈妈测试”。

The Economist wrote at length about the “mom test” on October 28, 2004, at http://www.economist.com/displaystory.cfm?story_id=3307430.

“没有人为可怜的用户说话”：摘自 Terry Winograd 中 Mitchell Kapor 的“软件设计宣言”，《将设计带入软件》（Addison Wesley，1996 年），以及 http://hci.stanford.edu/bds/1- kapor.htm。

“No one is speaking for the poor user”: From Mitchell Kapor’s “Software Design Manifesto” in Terry Winograd, Bringing Design to Software (Addison Wesley, 1996), and at http://hci.stanford.edu/bds/1-kapor.htm.

有关 Mozilla 基金会起源的更多信息，请参阅 Wikipedia 条目：http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mozilla_Foundation，以及 2005 年 1 月 13 日的 CNET 报道：http://news.com.com/2102- 7344_3-5519612.htm。

For more on the origins of the Mozilla Foundation, see Wikipedia’s entry at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mozilla_Foundation, and CNET coverage from January 13, 2005, at http://news.com.com/2102-7344_3-5519612.htm.

关于 CPIA 早期历史的两个有用文档是 2003 年 9 月的原始设计文档（http://wiki.osafoundation.org/bin/view/Journal/

ChandlerPresentationAndInteractionArchitecture

Sep2003）以及 Chandler 0.3 周期期间的后续文档（http://wiki） .osafoundation.org/bin/view/Projects/Cpia

ZeroPointThreeStatus。

Two useful documents on the early history of CPIA are the original September 2003 design document at http://wiki.osafoundation.org/bin/view/Journal/

ChandlerPresentationAndInteractionArchitecture

Sep2003, and later documentation during the Chandler 0.3 cycle at http://wiki.osafoundation.org/bin/view/Projects/Cpia

ZeroPointThreeStatus.

“管理会议上最喜欢的故事”：Peter Drucker，The Essential Drucker（Harper Business，2001），第 14 页。113.

“A favorite story at management meetings”: Peter Drucker, The Essential Drucker (Harper Business, 2001), p. 113.

“Chandler 0.2 即将发布”：Michael Toy 博客文章，2003 年 9 月 19 日，网址：http://blogs.osafoundation.org/blogotomy/000388.htm。

“Chandler 0.2 is about to ship”: Michael Toy blog posting, September 19, 2003, at http://blogs.osafoundation.org/blogotomy/000388.htm.

大卫·艾伦，《把事情做好》（维京企鹅，2001 年）。

David Allen, Getting Things Done (Viking Penguin, 2001).

有关 David Gelernter 的 Lifestreams 项目的信息，请访问 http://www.cs.yale.edu/homes/freeman/lifestreams.htm。

Information on David Gelernter’s Lifestreams project is at http://www.cs.yale.edu/homes/freeman/lifestreams.htm.

安迪·赫茨菲尔德 (Andy Hertzfeld) 的民俗网站位于 http://www.folklore.org。

Andy Hertzfeld’s Folklore site is at http://www.folklore.org.

“从这台机器上移动你的文件”：比尔·盖茨，引用于《今日美国》， 2003 年 6 月 29 日，网址：http://www.usatoday.com/tech/news/2003-06-29-gates-longhorn_x.htm。

“Moving your files from this machine”: Bill Gates, quoted in USA Today, June 29, 2003, at http://www.usatoday.com/tech/news/2003-06-29-gates-longhorn_x.htm.

“我们的员工数量相当稳定”：Mitch Kapor 于 2003 年 8 月 3 日在博客上发表的文章，网址为 http://blogs.osafoundation.org/mitch/000313.htm#

000313。

“Our head count has been fairly flat”: Mitch Kapor blog posting on August 3, 2003, at http://blogs.osafoundation.org/mitch/000313.htm#

000313.

“你对人们有什么建议吗”：Linus Torvalds，引用于Linux Times， 2004 年 6 月。Linux Times已停止出版。该文章曾经位于 http://www.linuxtimes.net/modules.php?name=News&file=article&sid=145，并且可以通过 Internet Archive 的 Wayback Machine 找到：http://web.archive.org/web/ 20041106193140/

http://www.linuxtimes.net/modules.php?name=News&file=article&sid=145。

“Do you have any advice for people”: Linus Torvalds, quoted in Linux Times, June 2004. Linux Times has ceased publication. The article used to be at http://www.linuxtimes.net/modules.php?name=News&file=article&sid=145 and can be found via the Internet Archive’s Wayback Machine at http://web.archive.org/web/20041106193140/

http://www.linuxtimes.net/modules.php?name=News&file=article&sid=145.

第7章

CHAPTER 7

详细视图

DETAIL VIEW

简单的事情应该简单：这句话被广泛认为是艾伦·凯的。我一直无法追踪其原始来源。有时也有人将其归功于拉里·沃尔。

Simple things should be simple: This quotation is widely attributed to Alan Kay. I have been unable to trace its original source. It is also occasionally attributed to Larry Wall.

Clay Shirky 于 2004 年 4 月 26 日在多对多博客中撰写了有关 Christopher Alexander 的“城市不是树”的文章，网址为：http://many.corante.com/archives/2004/04/26/a_

city_is_not_a_tree.php。Alexander 的文章最初发表于1965 年 4 月至 5 月的《建筑论坛》。可在线获取该文章：http://www.arquitetura.ufmg.br/rcesar/alex/_city

index.cfm。

Clay Shirky wrote about Christopher Alexander’s “A City Is Not a Tree” in the Many to Many blog on April 26, 2004, at http://many.corante.com/archives/2004/04/26/a_

city_is_not_a_tree.php. Alexander’s article was originally published in Architectural Forum, April–May 1965. It is available online at http://www.arquitetura.ufmg.br/rcesar/alex/_city

index.cfm.

有关 Donn Denman 和 MacBasic 取消的故事，请访问 Folklore.org，网址为：http://www.folklore.org/StoryView.py?project=Macintosh&story=MacBasic.txt。

The story of Donn Denman and the cancellation of MacBasic is at Folklore.org, at http://www.folklore.org/StoryView.py?project=Macintosh& story=MacBasic.txt.

维基百科在 http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Foo_bar 定义了Foobar，在 http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FUBAR 定义了fubar。

Wikipedia defines Foobar at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Foo_bar, and fubar at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FUBAR.

“因为人们会读到这些名字”：Ward Cunningham 在 OOPSLA 会议上的演讲，2004 年 10 月，温哥华，不列颠哥伦比亚省

“because people read these names”: Ward Cunningham’s talk at the OOPSLA Conference, October 2004, Vancouver, B.C.

Alec Flett 于 1999 年首次在 Mozilla 新闻组上发表了他对匈牙利符号的模仿。他在 2004 年 6 月 14 日的博客文章中重复了这一点，网址为 http://www.flett.org/archives/2004/06/14/16.34。 17/

索引.htm。

Alec Flett first posted his parody of Hungarian notation on a Mozilla newsgroup in 1999. He repeated it in a blog posting from June 14, 2004, at http://www.flett.org/archives/2004/06/14/16.34.17/

index.htm.

Joel Spolsky 在 2005 年 5 月 11 日的“让错误的代码看起来错误”中追踪了匈牙利符号的分叉，网址为：http://www.joelonsoftware.com/articles/Wrong.htm。Charles Simonyi 于 2005 年 7 月 8 日在博客中发表了他对匈牙利表示法的思考，网址为：http://blog.intentionalsoftware.com/intentional_software/2005/07/hungarian_notat.htm

。

Joel Spolsky traced the forking of Hungarian notation in “Making Wrong Code Look Wrong,” May 11, 2005, at http://www.joelonsoftware.com/articles/Wrong.htm. Charles Simonyi blogged his thinking on Hungarian notation on July 8, 2005, at http://blog.intentionalsoftware.com/intentional_

software/2005/07/hungarian_notat.htm.

“含着金汤匙出生”：埃丝特·戴森 (Esther Dyson) 在《福布斯》 1991 年 6 月的“On Technology Gets on Track”中对 On Technology 的评论。

“born with a silver spoon in its mouth”: Esther Dyson’s comment about On Technology was in “On Technology Gets on Track,” Forbes, June, 1991.

第 8 章

CHAPTER 8

白板上的便利贴

STICKIES ON A WHITEBOARD

“内部测试。” 。。是我们所做的事情”：这段关于内部测试的描述摘自 Microsoft 开发部门总经理 Scott Guthrie 于 2003 年 2 月 21 日发表的博客文章，网址为：http://weblogs.asp.net/scottgu/archive/2003/ 02/21/

2743.aspx。

“Dogfooding . . . is something we do”: This description of dogfooding is from a February 21, 2003, blog posting by Scott Guthrie, a general manager in the Microsoft Developer Division, at http://weblogs.asp.net/scottgu/archive/2003/02/21/

2743.aspx.

“我们使用我们构建的东西”：Robert Taylor，引用于 Thierry Bardini，Bootstrapping（斯坦福大学出版社，2000 年），第 14 页。154.

“We use what we build”: Robert Taylor, quoted in Thierry Bardini, Bootstrapping (Stanford University Press, 2000), p. 154.

“允许用户协作编辑”：来自 WebDAV 主站点 http://www.webdav.org/ 的说明。

“allows users to collaboratively edit”: Description from the main WebDAV site at http://www.webdav.org/.

“hazmat > 你知道什么才是真正有帮助的”：摘自 Chandler IRC 聊天频道，2004 年 7 月 14 日，http://wiki.osafoundation.org/script/getIrcTranscript。

cgi?频道=钱德勒&日期=20040714。

“hazmat > you know what would be really helpful”: From the Chandler IRC chat channel, July 14, 2004, at http://wiki.osafoundation.org/script/getIrcTranscript.

cgi?channel=chandler&date=20040714.

“人们似乎格外有耐心”：Ted Leung 于 2004 年 7 月 29 日发表的博客，网址为 http://www.sauria.com/blog/2004/Jul/29。

“People seem to be extraordinarily patient”: Blog posting by Ted Leung from July 29, 2004, at http://www.sauria.com/blog/2004/Jul/29.

2004 年 8 月下旬，对 Longhorn 的“破坏”进行了广泛的报道，包括放弃 WinFS。Microsoft Watch 的文章，标题为“Microsoft to Gut Longhorn to Make 2006 Delivery Date”，位于 http://www.microsoft- watch.com/article2/0,1995,1640183,00.asp。

There was extensive coverage of the “gutting” of Longhorn, including the dropping of WinFS, in late August 2004. Microsoft Watch’s article, titled “Microsoft to Gut Longhorn to Make 2006 Delivery Date,” is at http://www.microsoft-watch.com/article2/0,1995,1640183,00.asp.

News.com 采访了比尔盖茨：http://news.com.com/Gates%3A+Longhorn+changed+to+make+deadlines/2008-1016_3-5327377.htm。

News.com interviewed Bill Gates at http://news.com.com/Gates%3A+Longhorn+changed+to+make+deadlines/2008-1016_3-5327377.htm.

Microsoft 副总裁 Jim Allchin 关于这些变化的备忘录发布在 Microsoft Watch 上：http://www.microsoft-watch.com/article2/0,1995,1640602,00.asp。

A memo from Microsoft VP Jim Allchin on the changes was published on Microsoft Watch at http://www.microsoft-watch.com/article2/0,1995,1640602,00.asp.

第9章

CHAPTER 9

方法

METHODS

Edsger Dijkstra，“转到被认为有害的声明”，ACM 通讯， 1968 年 3 月，网址：http://www.acm.org/classics/oct95/。

Edsger Dijkstra, “Go To Statement Considered Harmful,” Communications of the ACM, March 1968, at http://www.acm.org/classics/oct95/.



“项链由单个珍珠串成”和“作为一个迟钝的人”：Edsger Dijkstra，“结构化编程笔记”，1969 年，网址：http://www.cs.utexas.edu/users/EWD/ewd02xx/EWD249 .PDF。

“necklace strung from individual pearls” and “As a slow-witted human being”: Edsger Dijkstra, “Notes on Structured Programming,” 1969, at http://www.cs.utexas.edu/users/EWD/ewd02xx/

EWD249.PDF.

Edsger Dijkstra，“谦虚的程序员”，1972 年图灵奖演讲，网址：http://www.cs.utexas.edu/users/EWD/ewd03xx/EWD340.PDF

。

Edsger Dijkstra, “The Humble Programmer,” 1972 Turing Award lecture, at http://www.cs.utexas.edu/users/EWD/ewd03xx/

EWD340.PDF.

“每个程序层都要被理解”：Dijkstra，“结构化编程注释”。

“each program layer is to be understood”: Dijkstra, “Notes on Structured Programming.”

“除非开发人员计划并跟踪”：Watts Humphrey，“大型软件项目为何失败”，CrossTalk，2005 年 3 月，网址：http://www.stsc.hill.af.mil/CrossTalk/2005/03/0503

Humphrey.htm。

“Unless developers plan and track”: Watts Humphrey, “Why Big Software Projects Fail,” CrossTalk, March 2005, at http://www.stsc.hill.af.mil/CrossTalk/2005/03/0503

Humphrey.htm.

“关于知识工作者任务的大多数讨论”：Peter Drucker，“有效的执行者”（1966 年），载于《The Essential Drucker》（Harper Business，2001 年），第 17 页。225.

“Most discussions of the knowledge worker’s task”: Peter Drucker, “The Effective Executive” (1966), in The Essential Drucker (Harper Business,2001), p. 225.

Watts Humphrey 对他的 IBM 经历的描述来自于Robert L. Glass 编辑的《In the Beginning: Recollections of Software Pioneers 》中的“Reflections on a Software Life”。（IEEE 计算机协会出版社，1998 年），第 14 页。29 及以下。

Watts Humphrey’s account of his IBM experience is from his “Reflections on a Software Life” in In the Beginning: Recollections of Software Pioneers, Robert L. Glass, ed. (IEEE Computer Society Press, 1998), p. 29 and ff.

“我女儿说服我去”：Humphrey 在“Watts Humphrey：他写了一本关于调试的书”中对 Humphrey 的采访，《商业周刊》， 2005 年 5 月 9 日，

网址： http://yahoo.businessweek.com/print/magazine/content/05_19 /b3932038_mz009.htm。

“My daughter persuaded me to go”: Humphrey interview in “Watts Humphrey: He Wrote the Book on Debugging,” Business Week, May 9, 2005, at http://yahoo.businessweek.com/print/magazine/

content/05_19/b3932038_mz009.htm.

“第一级组织”：Mark Minasi 的《软件阴谋：为什么软件公司推出有缺陷的产品，它们如何伤害你，以及你可以做些什么》（McGraw-Hill，2000 年）中引用了 Humphrey 的非正式描述，第 48-49 页。

“An organization at Level 1”: Humphrey’s informal description is quoted in Mark Minasi, The Software Conspiracy: Why Software Companies Put Out Faulty Products, How They Can Hurt You, and What You Can Do About It (McGraw-Hill, 2000), pp. 48–49.

“CMM 崇尚过程，但忽视”：James Bach，“CMM 的不成熟”，《美国程序员》， 1994 年 9 月，网址：http://www.satisfice.com/articles/cmm.shtml。

“The CMM reveres process, but ignores”: James Bach, “The Immaturity of CMM,” American Programmer, September 1994, at http://www.satisfice.com/articles/cmm.shtml.

“我们都为组织工作”：Watts Humphrey 在 2002 年 8 月芝加哥 XP Agile Universe 会议上题为“Setting the Agile Context”的演讲的幻灯片。幻灯片位于 http://www.xpuniverse.com/pdfs/SettingTheAgile

背景瓦茨汉弗莱。

“We all work for organizations”: Slide set for a lecture by Watts Humphrey titled “Setting the Agile Context” at the XP Agile Universe Conference, Chicago, August 2002. Slides at http://www.xpuniverse.com/pdfs/SettingTheAgile

ContextWattsHumphrey.

“在所有现代技术中”：摘自软件工程学院发布的视频，网址为：http://www.sei.cmu.edu/videos/watts/DPWatts.mov。

“In all of modern technology”: From a video distributed by the Software Engineering Institute, available at http://www.sei.cmu.edu/videos/watts/DPWatts.mov.

米纳西，软件阴谋。

Minasi, The Software Conspiracy.

水手 1 号错误的描述见 http://nssdc.gsfc.nasa.gov/nmc/tmp/MARIN1.htm。

The Mariner 1 bug is described at http://nssdc.gsfc.nasa.gov/nmc/tmp/MARIN1.htm.

James Gleick 在 http://www.around.com/ariane.htm 上讲述了 Ariane 5 错误的故事。

James Gleick tells the story of the Ariane 5 bug at http://www.around.com/ariane.htm.

Nancy Leveson 和 Clark S. Turner 在 1993 年 7 月发表于IEEE Computer 的论文中详细介绍了 Therac-25 错误，网址为：http://courses.cs.vt.edu/~cs3604/lib/Therac_25/Therac_1.htm

。

The Therac-25 bug is detailed in a paper by Nancy Leveson and Clark S. Turner in IEEE Computer, July 1993, at http://courses.cs.vt.edu/~cs3604/lib/Therac_25/

Therac_1.htm.

1991 年爱国者导弹错误有详细记录，例如 http://www.cs.usyd.edu.au/~alum/patriot_bug.htm。

The 1991 Patriot missile bug is well documented, for instance at http://www.cs.usyd.edu.au/~alum/patriot_bug.htm.

Jon Ogg 的演讲是在 2004 年 4 月于盐湖城举行的系统与软件技术会议上进行的。

Jon Ogg’s talk was at the Systems & Software Technology Conference, Salt Lake City, April 2004.

“国防部的软件数量”：Barry Boehm 在 2004 年系统与软件技术会议上。有关软件模式运动的更多信息，请参阅 Erich Gamma、Richard Helm、Ralph Johnson 和 John Vlissides 的《设计模式：元素》可重用的面向对象软件（Addison Wesley，1995）。

“The amount of software the Department of Defense”: Barry Boehm at the Systems & Software Technology Conference, 2004. For more on the software patterns movement, see Erich Gamma, Richard Helm, Ralph Johnson, and John Vlissides, Design Patterns: Elements of Reusable Object-Oriented Software (Addison Wesley, 1995).

“程序员就像木匠”：Brian Hayes，“The Post-OOP Paradigm”，American Scientist， 2003 年 3 月至 4 月，网址：http://www.americanscientist.org/template/Asset

Detail/assetid/17307。

“programmers are like carpenters”: Brian Hayes, “The Post-OOP Paradigm,” American Scientist, March–April 2003, at http://www.americanscientist.org/template/Asset

Detail/assetid/17307.

“这些具有优势”：来自 Kent Beck 和 Ward Cunningham，“面向对象思维教学实验室”，摘自 OOPSLA '89 会议记录，1989 年 10 月，新奥尔良，网址：http://c2.com/doc/ oopsla89/paper.htm。

“These have the advantages”: From Kent Beck and Ward Cunningham, “A Laboratory for Teaching Object-Oriented Thinking,” from the OOPSLA ’89 Conference Proceedings, October 1989, New Orleans, at http://c2.com/doc/oopsla89/paper.htm.

Barry Boehm，“软件开发和增强的螺旋模型”，ACM SIGSOFT 软件工程笔记，1986 年 8 月。

Barry Boehm, “A Spiral Model of Software Development and Enhancement,” in ACM SIGSOFT Software Engineering Notes, August 1986.

“研讨会的部分目的”：Brian Marick 于 2004 年 3 月 17 日发表的博客文章，网址为：http://www.testing.com/cgi-bin/blog/2004/03/17#march17。

“Part of the purpose of the workshop”: Brian Marick’s blog posting from March 17, 2004, is at http://www.testing.com/cgi-bin/blog/2004/03/17# march17.

敏捷宣言位于 http://agilemanifesto.org/。

The Agile Manifesto is at http://agilemanifesto.org/.

“我们采取了所有这些做法”：罗恩·杰弗里斯的引述来自萨姆·威廉姆斯，“完全很棒的软件？” 沙龙， 2002 年 5 月 29 日，网址：http://archive.salon.com/tech/feature/2002/05/29/extreme_programming/index.htm

。

“We were taking all these practices”: Ron Jeffries’s quote is from Sam Williams, “Totally Awesome Software?” in Salon, May 29, 2002, at http://archive.salon.com/tech/feature/2002/05/29/

extreme_programming/index.htm.

“始终实现目标”：YAGNI 原则定义于 http://xp.c2.com/YouArentGonnaNeedIt.htm。

“Always implement things”: The YAGNI principle is defined at http://xp.c2.com/YouArentGonnaNeedIt.htm.

“Deliver Crap Quickly”：摘自 Robert Lefkowitz 2004 年 4 月发表的题为“ExtremeProgramming Refactored”的博客文章；它曾经位于http://r0ml.blogs.com/fot/2004/04/extreme_program

.htm，现在已离线。网址为：http://web.archive.org/web/20040810155153/http:

//r0ml.blogs.com/fot/2004/04/extreme_program.htm。

“Deliver Crap Quickly”: From Robert Lefkowitz’s blog posting titled “Extreme Programming Refactored” from April 2004; it used to be at http://r0ml.blogs.com/fot/2004/04/extreme_program

.htm and is now offline. Available at http://web.archive.org/web/20040810155153/http://

r0ml.blogs.com/fot/2004/04/extreme_program.htm.

“宾夕法尼亚州两位 2004 年的研究”：Phillip A. Laplante 和 Colin J. Neill，“瀑布模型即将消亡”和其他城市神话，” ACM Queue， 2004 年 2 月，网址：http://www.acmqueue。 com/modules.php？名称=内容&pa=显示页面&pid=110。

“A 2004 study by two Pennsylvania”: Phillip A. Laplante and Colin J. Neill, ‘The Demise of the Waterfall Model Is Imminent’ and Other Urban Myths,” ACM Queue, February 2004, at http://www.acmqueue.com/modules.php? name=Content&pa=showpage&pid=110.

“如果你有哪怕是最轻微的一点”：Joel Spolsky 于 2003 年 11 月 14 日发表的博客文章，网址为 http://www.joelonsoftware.com/items/2003/11/14.htm。

“If you have even the slightest bit”: Joel Spolsky blog posting from November 14, 2003, at http://www.joelonsoftware.com/items/2003/11/14.htm.

“谨防方法论”：Joel Spolsky，“巨无霸 vs. 裸体厨师”，2001 年 1 月 18 日发布，网址为 http://www.joelonsoftware.com/articles/fog000000

0024.htm。还收录在Joel on Software（Apress，2004 年），第 14 页。237.

“Beware of Methodologies”: Joel Spolsky, “Big Macs vs. The Naked Chef,” posting from January 18, 2001, at http://www.joelonsoftware.com/articles/fog000000

0024.htm. Also collected in Joel on Software (Apress, 2004), p. 237.

Joel 测试：Joel Spolsky 于 2000 年 8 月 9 日发布，网址为 http://www.joelon software.com/articles/fog0000000043.htm，以及Joel on Software，第 17 页。17.

The Joel Test: Joel Spolsky posting from August 9, 2000, at http://www.joelon software.com/articles/fog0000000043.htm, and also in Joel on Software, p. 17.

37 Signals 在 2006 年出版的 PDF 书籍Getting Real 中详细介绍了其理念，网址为 https://gettingreal.37signals.com/。

37 Signals presented more on its philosophy in a 2006 PDF book, Getting Real, at https://gettingreal.37signals.com/.

Google 的软件开发方法在 Quentin Hardy 的“Google Thinks Small”一文中概述，《福布斯》， 2005 年 11 月 14 日，网址：http://www.forbes.com/global/2005/1114/054A_print.htm

。

Google’s software development methods are outlined in Quentin Hardy, “Google Thinks Small,” Forbes, November 14, 2005, at http://www.forbes.com/global/2005/1114/054A_

print.htm.

Nicholas Carr，“IT 并不重要”，《哈佛商业评论》， 2003 年 5 月，网址：http://www.nicholasgcarr.com/articles/matter.htm。

Nicholas Carr, “IT Doesn’t Matter,” Harvard Business Review, May 2003, at http://www.nicholasgcarr.com/articles/matter.htm.

第10章

CHAPTER 10

工程师和艺术家

ENGINEERS AND ARTISTS

所有引用均来自 1968 年北约软件工程会议报告：P. Naur 和 B. Randell 编辑，“软件工程：北约科学委员会赞助的会议报告”，德国加米施，1968 年 10 月 7-11 日（北约科学事务部，1969）。1969 年会议报告：B. Randell 和 JN Buxton，编辑，“软件工程技术：北约科学委员会赞助的会议报告”，意大利罗马，1969 年 10 月 27-31 日（北约科学事务部，1970 年） ）。报告和背景材料均可在 http://homepages.cs.ncl.ac.uk/brian.randell/NATO/ 上获取。

All quotes are from the 1968 NATO software engineering conference report: P. Naur and B. Randell, eds., “Software Engineering: Report of a Conference Sponsored by the NATO Science Committee,” Garmisch, Germany, October 7–11, 1968 (Scientific Affairs Division, NATO, 1969). The 1969 conference report: B. Randell and J. N. Buxton, eds., “Software Engineering Techniques: Report of a Conference Sponsored by the NATO Science Committee,” Rome, Italy, October 27–31, 1969 (Scientific Affairs Division, NATO, 1970). Both reports and background material are available at http://homepages.cs.ncl.ac.uk/brian.randell/NATO/.

得克萨斯州关于程序员自称工程师的争议记录在“任何其他名字的工程师：立法机关决定计算机程序员是否可以合法使用这个头衔”，作者：RG Ratcliffe，《休斯敦纪事报》，2003 年 3 月 29日。

The Texas dispute over programmers calling themselves engineers is chronicled in “An Engineer by Any Other Name: Legislature to Decide if Computer Programmers Can Legally Use the Title,” by R. G. Ratcliffe, Houston Chronicle, March 29, 2003.

“完全接受该术语”：Brian Randell，“1968/69 NATO 软件工程报告”，网址：http://homepages.cs.ncl.ac.uk/brian.randell/NATO/NATOReports/index.htm

。

“fully accepted that the term”: Brian Randell, “The 1968/69 NATO Software Engineering Reports,” at http://homepages.cs.ncl.ac.uk/brian.randell/NATO/

NATOReports/index.htm.

“‘软件工程’这个词是特意选择的”：1968 年会议报告，第 17 页。8.

“The phrase ‘software engineering’ was deliberately chosen”: 1968 conference report, p. 8.

“与第一次会议不同”：Randell，“1968/69 NATO 软件工程报告”。

“Unlike the first conference”: Randell, “The 1968/69 NATO Software Engineering Reports.”

“几乎没有相似之处”：1969 年会议报告，第 17 页。8.

“Bore little resemblance”: 1969 conference report, p. 8.

Tom Simpson 的“杰作工程”位于 http://homepages.cs.ncl.ac.uk/brian.randell/NATO/NATOReports/index.htm#Appendix

。

Tom Simpson’s “Masterpiece Engineering” is at http://homepages.cs.ncl.ac.uk/brian.randell/NATO/

NATOReports/index.htm#Appendix.

关于艺术/科学二分法的明确讨论可以在 Steven Johnson 的《界面文化》 （HarperEdge，1997）的序言中找到。

A definitive discussion of the art/science dichotomy can be found in the preface to Steven Johnson, Interface Culture (HarperEdge, 1997).

有关工程学的词源，请参阅 http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering #Etymology 和韦伯斯特新世界词典（Simon & Schuster，1984），第 17 页。463.

For the etymology of engineering, see http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Engineering #Etymology and Webster’s New World Dictionary (Simon & Schuster, 1984), p. 463.

“一个软件工程师，一个硬件工程师”：这个笑话在网上很多地方都能找到；例如：http://www.eff.org/Net_culture/Folklore/Humor/engineer.joke

。

“A Software Engineer, a Hardware Engineer”: This joke is found in many locations online; for example: http://www.eff.org/Net_culture/Folklore/Humor/

engineer.joke.

“‘软件工程’是重要的东西”：L. Peter Deutsch，1999 年 1 月 ACM 研究员简介，网址：http://www.acm.org/sigsoft/SEN/deutsch.htm。

“‘Software engineering’ is something”: L. Peter Deutsch, January 1999 ACM Fellow profile, at http://www.acm.org/sigsoft/SEN/deutsch.htm.

物理学家“处理绝对基础”：Alan Kay，OOPSLA 会议上的图灵奖演讲，2004 年 10 月。视频可在 http://www.acm.org/talks/AlanKay/KayTuring.htm 上获取。

physicists “deal with the absolute foundations”: Alan Kay, Turing Award lecture at OOPSLA Conference, October 2004. Video is available at http://www.acm.org/talks/AlanKay/KayTuring.htm.

“Hopper 相信编程”：摘自她的官方传记页面 http://www.hopper.navy.mil/grace/grace.htm。

“Hopper believed that programming”: From her official biography page at http://www.hopper.navy.mil/grace/grace.htm.

“我们所知道的软件”和“有两种含义”：Charles Simonyi 在“程序员工作聚会”活动中，2004 年 3 月 16 日，引用自 Scott Rosenberg，“为什么软件仍然很糟糕”，沙龙，2004 年 3 月 19 日，网址：http://archive.salon.com/tech/col/rose/2004/03/19/programmers_at_work/index.htm

。

“Software as we know it” and “There are two meanings”: Charles Simonyi at “Programmers at Work Reunion” event, March 16, 2004, quoted in Scott Rosenberg, “Why Software Still Stinks,” Salon, March 19, 2004, at http://archive.salon.com/tech/col/rose/2004/03/19/

programmers_at_work/index.htm.

“它有点像建筑师”：Clare Tristram，“每个人都是程序员”，《技术评论》， 2003 年 11 月，网址：http://www.techreview.com/read_article.aspx?id=13377&ch=infotech。

“It’s something like an architect”: Clare Tristram, “Everyone’s a Programmer,” Technology Review, November 2003, at http://www.techreview.com/read_article.aspx?id=13377&ch=infotech.

“有人曾经问过我”：Charles Simonyi 对 David Berlind 的采访，2005 年 3 月 22 日，网址：http://blogs.zdnet.com/BTL/index.php?p=1190。

“Somebody once asked me”: Charles Simonyi interview with David Berlind, March 22, 2005, at http://blogs.zdnet.com/BTL/index.php?p=1190.

“所有非平凡的抽象”和“抽象并非真的”：Joel Spolsky，“The Law of Leaky Abstractions”，2002 年 11 月 11 日，在线：http://joelonsoftware.com/articles/LeakyAbstractions。

htm 以及Joel on Software (Apress, 2004)，p. 11。197.

“All non-trivial abstractions” and “Abstractions do not really”: Joel Spolsky, “The Law of Leaky Abstractions,” November 11, 2002, online at http://joelonsoftware.com/articles/LeakyAbstractions.

htm and also in Joel on Software (Apress, 2004), p. 197.

“一位著名的科学家”：史蒂芬·霍金，《时间简史》（Bantam，1988），第 14 页。1.

“A well-known scientist”: Stephen Hawking, A Brief History of Time (Bantam, 1988), p. 1.

苏斯博士，《乌龟耶特尔和其他故事》（兰登书屋，1958 年）。

Dr. Seuss, Yertle the Turtle and Other Stories (Random House, 1958).

“如果建筑商建造了房屋”：这句话被广泛认为出自杰拉尔德·温伯格之手，并在发给作者的电子邮件中得到了证实。

“If builders built houses”: Quotation widely attributed to Gerald Weinberg and confirmed in email to author.

Alan Kay 演讲的描述来自作者在 2003 年 4 月举行的 O'Reilly 新兴技术会议 (ETech) 上的观察。Lisa Rein 记录了该活动；请参阅http://www.lisarein.com/alankay/tour.htm。

Description of Alan Kay’s presentation is from author’s observation at the O’Reilly Emerging Technology Conference (ETech), April, 2003. Lisa Rein recorded the event; see http://www.lisarein.com/alankay/tour.htm.

“我们只是不知道如何”：Kay，ETech 演讲。

“We just don’t know how”: Kay, ETech talk.

“如果你看看今天的软件”：摘自“与 Alan Kay 的对话”，ACM Queue， 2004 年 12 月至 2005 年 1 月，网址：http://acmqueue.com/modules.php?name=Content&pa=showpage&pid=273&page=2。

“If you look at software today”: From “A Conversation with Alan Kay,” ACM Queue, December 2004–January 2005, at http://acmqueue.com/modules.php?name=Content&pa=showpage&pid=273&page=2.

“你可以建造一个狗窝”：Alan Kay，“计算机革命尚未发生”，1997 年 Smalltalk 25 周年 OOPSLA 上的主题演讲。视频位于 http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=2950949730059754521。

“You can make a doghouse”: Alan Kay, “The Computer Revolution Hasn’t Happened Yet,” keynote address at OOPSLA 1997, on the 25th anniversary of Smalltalk. Video available at http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=2950949730059754521.

“都是空气和玻璃”：Kay，OOPSLA 1997 主题演讲。

“It’s all air and glass”: Kay, OOPSLA 1997 keynote.

“我们不必建造金字塔”：Kay，OOPSLA 2004 年图灵奖演讲。

“We don’t have to build pyramids”: Kay, OOPSLA 2004 Turing Award lecture.

“有一天，我们要发明”：Alan Kay 在 ETech 2003 上的集体采访。

“Someday, we’re going to invent”: Alan Kay group interview at ETech 2003.

“像计算机一样的东西”：Kay，OOPSLA 1997 主题演讲。

“Something like a computer”: Kay, OOPSLA 1997 keynote.

“对‘印欧语系’的反应”和“用计算机术语来说，Smalltalk”：Alan Kay，“Smalltalk 的早期历史”，ACM SIGPLAN 1993，网址：http://portal.acm.org/itation.cfm？ coll=GUIDE&dl=GUIDE&id=15536​​4。

“a reaction against the ‘Indo-European’” and “In computer terms, Smalltalk”: Alan Kay, “The Early History of Smalltalk,” ACM SIGPLAN 1993, at http://portal.acm.org/citation.cfm?coll=GUIDE&dl=GUIDE&id=155364.

“我创造了面向对象这个术语”：Kay，OOPSLA 1997 主题演讲。

“I made up the term object-oriented”: Kay, OOPSLA 1997 keynote.

“在 PARC，我们的想法是”：“与 Alan Kay 的对话”，ACM Queue。

“At PARC, our idea was”: “A Conversation with Alan Kay,” ACM Queue.

“冯·诺依曼语言不断保持”：John Backus，“编程能否从冯·诺依曼风格中解放出来？” 1977 年图灵奖讲座，ACM 通讯， 1978 年 8 月，网址：http://portal.acm.org/affiliated/itation.cfm?id=359579&dl=ACM&coll=ACM。

“Von Neumann languages constantly keep”: John Backus, “Can Programming Be Liberated from the von Neumann Style?” 1977 Turing Award Lecture, Communications of the ACM, August 1978, at http://portal.acm.org/affiliated/citation.cfm?id=359579&dl=ACM&coll=ACM.

“当您了解计算机科学时”：Jaron Lanier，引用于 Janice J. Hess 的“从头开始编码”，Sun Developer Network，2003 年 1 月 23 日，网址：http://java.sun.com/features/2003/01 /lanier_qa1.htm。

“When you learn about computer science”: Jaron Lanier, quoted in Janice J. Hess, “Coding from Scratch,” Sun Developer Network, January 23, 2003, at http://java.sun.com/features/2003/01/lanier_qa1.htm.

“Gordian software”：Jaron Lanier，“为什么 Gordian Software 让我相信猫和苹果的存在”，Edge.org，2003 年 11 月 19 日，网址：http://www.edge.org/3rd_culture/lanier03/ lanier_index.htm

。

“Gordian software”: Jaron Lanier, “Why Gordian Software Has Convinced Me to Believe in the Reality of Cats and Apples,” Edge.org, November 19, 2003, at http://www.edge.org/3rd_culture/lanier03/lanier_

index.htm.

“如果你做一个小小的改变”：拉尼尔在赫斯，“从头开始编码”。

“If you make a small change”: Lanier in Hess, “Coding from Scratch.”

“世界就像我们的神经系统”、“努力成为一个更好的猜测者”和“当你不再强调协议时”：Lanier，“Gordian Software”。

“The world as our nervous systems,” “Try to be an ever better guesser,” and “When you de-emphasize protocols”: Lanier, “Gordian Software.”

“非常不同和激进”：Jaron Lanier 在 Future Salon 的演讲，2004 年 4 月 20 日。信息见 http://www.futuresalon.org/2004/04/full_salon_with。

嗯。视频位于http://www.archive.org/movies/details-db.php?collection=open source_movies&collectionid=FutureSalon_04_2004。

“very different and radical”: Jaron Lanier talk at Future Salon, April 20, 2004. Information at http://www.futuresalon.org/2004/04/full_salon_with.

htm. Video at http://www.archive.org/movies/details-db.php?collection=open source_movies&collectionid=FutureSalon_04_2004.

“程序超越的时刻”：Lanier，“Gordian Software”。

“The moment programs grow beyond”: Lanier, “Gordian Software.”

“小程序是如此简单”：Jaron Lanier 在 OOPSLA 会议上的演讲，2004 年 10 月。

“Little programs are so easy”: Jaron Lanier talk at OOPSLA Conference, October 2004.

Daniel Dennett 对“Gordian Software”的评论位于 http://www.edge.org/discourse/gordian.htm#dennett。

Daniel Dennett’s critique of “Gordian Software” is at http://www.edge.org/discourse/gordian.htm#dennett.

“人类面临的根本挑战”：Jaron Lanier，作者访谈，2005 年 10 月。

“The fundamental challenge for humanity”: Jaron Lanier, interview with author, October 2005.

“我只是厌倦了这种愚蠢”：Jaron Lanier 在 OOPSLA 2004 上。

“I’m just sick of the stupidity”: Jaron Lanier at OOPSLA 2004.

“我们被进化模式困住了”：Robert N. Britcher，《软件的极限》（Addison Wesley，1999），第 14 页。190.

“We are stuck with the evolutionary pattern”: Robert N. Britcher, The Limits of Software (Addison Wesley, 1999), p. 190.

“基本属性”及以下内容：Frederick Brooks，“No Silver Bullet: Essence and Accidents of Software Engineering”，Computer 20:4（1987 年 4 月），第 10-19 页。

“essential property” and following: Frederick Brooks, “No Silver Bullet: Essence and Accidents of Software Engineering,” Computer 20:4 (April 1987), pp. 10–19.

“计算机科学陷入了深深的麻烦”：Gerald Jay Sussman，“通过多样性实现稳健设计”，1999 年 9 月 11 日，网址：http://www.mindously.org/GE/Robust-Design-Diversity-Sussman.htm。

“Computer science is in deep trouble”: Gerald Jay Sussman, “Robust Design Through Diversity,” September 11, 1999, at http://www.mindfully.org/GE/Robust-Design-Diversity-Sussman.htm.

David Lorge Parnas，“战略防御系统的软件方面”，ACM 通讯， 1985 年 12 月，网址为 http://portal.acm.org/itation.cfm?id=214961&coll=ACM&dl=ACM。

David Lorge Parnas, “Software Aspects of Strategic Defense Systems,” Communications of the ACM, December 1985, and at http://portal.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=214961&coll=ACM&dl=ACM.

“计算机通过代码告诉你”：Bill Joy 在 2004 年纽约时报采访中，Jon Gertner，2004 年 6 月 6 日。

“With code, the computer tells you”: Bill Joy in a 2004 New York Times interview by Jon Gertner, June 6, 2004.

“我的观点是我们应该”：Richard Gabriel，Janice J. Hess 的《编程之诗》，Sun Developer Network，2002 年 12 月 3 日，网址：http://java.sun.com/features/2002/11/ gabriel_qa.htm。

“My view is that we should”: Richard Gabriel in Janice J. Hess, “The Poetry of Programming,” Sun Developer Network, December 3, 2002, at http://java.sun.com/features/2002/11/gabriel_qa.htm.

“就好像所有作家都一样”：摘自理查德·加布里埃尔（Richard Gabriel）名为“软件在哪里？”的幻灯片。可以在 http://www.dreamsongs.com/Essays.htm 上找到。

“It is as if all writers”: From a slide set by Richard Gabriel called “Whither Software?” available at http://www.dreamsongs.com/Essays.htm.

“我认为我们需要感到羞耻”和“我们所做的一切”：Richard Gabriel 在软件开发论坛上的演讲，加利福尼亚州帕洛阿尔托，2003 年 1 月 23 日。
